The Cub Cadet® Ultima Series ZTX6 60 is a 60-inch zero-turn lawn mower with a 25.5 HP engine. It features an AeroForce™ Max reinforced fabricated deck, which is designed to provide a high-quality cut with few clumps and an even finish. The mower is made from 10-gauge reinforced steel and has low-maintenance spindles. Its smooth arc triple blades and deep dome deck design allow you to mow a wide area of grass. With dual hydrostatic transmissions, it offers quick ground speeds, giving your yard a professional look.

Name: DR Power Equipment DR Pro MAX 34" Field and Brush Mower 20 HP Walk-Behind
Description:
\n \nOur PRO MAX34 model gives you the widest mowing deck we've ever offered on a walk-behind brush mower. The extra width puts the machine's cut path well outside of its wheelbase, allowing you to easily mow right up next to fence lines, out buildings, trees, and other obstacles. \n \nThis is the widest, fastest, easiest-to-use (with Power Steering, of course) brush mower we have ever offered, coupled with our top-of-the-line 20HP V-Twin engine. It is perfect for you if you simply want to get the job done as quickly and as easily as possible. \n \n  \n \nProduct Summary: \n
    \n
  • 20 HP Electric-Starting Briggs V-Twin engine
    • \n
  • 34" brush deck with with side discharge cuts mowing time by up to 40% over competitive models.
    • \n
  • 3 forward speeds, 1 reverse
    • \n
  • Pivoting deck follows contours of ground
    • \n
  • Oil pump for better performance on hills
    • \n
  • Accepts all optional attachments
    • \n
  • See Features and Specs Tabs for more product details
    • \n
\n  \n

Power Steering is Easy on You!

\nOur disc brake system provides Power Steering. Each wheel is equipped with its own brake, operated by a hand lever. Just squeeze the brake on one side, and the mower will pivot easily around that wheel. You're in control...without wrestling the machine! \n \n  \n

20 HP Briggs Twin-Cylinder Professional Series Engine

\nThe legendary power, performance and durability of Briggs & Stratton® engines make them the obvious choice for our Walk-Behind Field and Brush Mowers. The PRO MAX34 20 HP model features a Briggs Professional Series OHV twin-cylinder engine, with full-pressure oil pump (great for positive lubrication even on side slopes), a spin-off oil filter, 650 cc of displacement, (two) cast-iron cylinder sleeves, plus easy, turn-key electric-starting \n \n

Name: EGO POWER+ 42 in Z6 Zero Turn Mower with e-STEER ZT4205S
Description:
\n

Details

\nDrives like a car, turns like a ZTR! Introducing the industry’s first e-STEER™ technology, which delivers ultimate control with the added precision of a steering wheel. This 42-inch electric zero turn lawn mower packs the equivalent of 22 horsepower in a gas-powered mower without the noise, fuss, or fumes! Featuring Peak Power™+ technology, it combines the power of six EGO 56V ARC Lithium™ batteries. This 42-inch zero turn lawn mower cuts up to 2.5 acres on a single charge with the four included 56V 12.0Ah ARC Lithium™ batteries and is fully expandable so you can cut three, four, five, or as many acres as you need. Four independent brushless motors deliver the power and performance of gas while an adjustable hydraulic seat suspension delivers a comfortable mowing experience. Customize the ride with an LCD interface featuring three driving modes that can be accessed with the touch of a finger: Control, Standard, and Sport. Premium features like LED lights, a USB charging port, and Bluetooth come standard to make the experience unlike any other ZTR. Experience zero-turn mowing like never before with the EGO Power+ 42” Z6 Zero Turn Riding Mower with e-STEER™—Power Like No Other. \n

Name: RYOBI 80V HP Brushless 30 in. Battery Electric Cordless Zero Turn Mower with 80V 10 Ah Batteries
Description:
\n

\n \n

About This Product

\nIntroducing RYOBI's first lithium-ion battery powered zero turn riding mower, the RYOBI 80V HP Brushless 30" Lithium Electric ZTR.* HP Technology and 80V batteries combine to deliver the power equivalent of a 28 horsepower gas engine*, while eliminating the hassle and maintenance of a gas mower. This rider cuts up to 1 acre per charge with the help of 4 brushless motors and (2) 80V 10Ah batteries, with a Super Charger that fully recharges in 1.5 hours so you're ready for your next job. The revolutionary iDrive system uses an intuitive one-handed joystick steering to maneuver around objects more easily than a traditional ZTR. The innovative LCD screen displays runtime, battery life, and more, while the Riding Mower app allows you to monitor charge time and battery life remotely. The 12-point height adjustment allows you to select the perfect cutting height between 1.5" and 4.5". This mower continues to lead innovation with the compatible Bagger Boost accessory, which quickly clears the chute with the press of a button. The 30" deck and rubber side discharge chute allow this rider to fit through a standard 36" gate, and makes it easy to maneuver around landscaping. Designed with comfort and convenience in mind, this mower features a premium seat, a USB port to charge phones, a storage compartment, and LED headlights. Lawn maintenance will never be the same thanks to the RYOBI 80V HP Brushless 30" Lithium Electric Zero Turn Riding Mower. \n

Highlights

\n
    \n
  • 80V HP Technology delivers the power equivalent of a 28 horsepower gas engine (*Based on the output of each brushless motor)
    • \n
  • Powered by 4 brushless motors with (2) 80V 10Ah lithium-ion batteries, giving users the power they need with the convenience of cordless
    • \n
  • A certified RYOBI RXT technician can diagnose and service right from your home (available in select regions). For service & replacement parts, call 1-800-525-2579.
    • \n
  • Cuts up to 1 acre per charge & fully recharges in 1.5 hours with the included Hyper Charger
    • \n
  • Compatible with the RYOBI 40V platform of over 85 40V products, allowing you to add up to (2) 40V batteries from your collection to extend your runtime
    • \n
  • Features the iDrive intelligent one-handed drive system for precision steering and easy maneuverability around trees and landscaping
    • \n
  • Low maintenance: no belts, spark plugs or filters. Battery operated: quiet cutting, no gas, no fumes, just charge and go
    • \n
  • 30 in. 14-gauge heavy-duty steel deck with rubber side discharge easily fits through a standard 36 in. gate
    • \n
  • Multi-drive and blade speeds allow users to choose the perfect settings for the job at hand
    • \n
  • 12 position manual deck adjustment with 1.5 in. to 4.5 in. adjustable cutting height
    • \n
  • Innovated Bagger Boost accessory clears the chute with just the push of a button. This mower is also side discharge and mulching capable
    • \n
  • Premium seat, armrests and 2 cup holders for a luxurious mowing experience
    • \n
  • LCD screen and control panel to monitor runtime, battery life, cut speed, drive speed, on/off headlights and pair with the RYOBI riding mower app via bluetooth
    • \n
  • Convenient features like a USB port to charge phones, storage compartment and impressive LED headlights that allow you to mow at dawn or dusk
    • \n
  • Reaches up to 7 MPH with a premium seat to minimize the impact of rough terrain
    • \n
  • Easy access rear charging port that charges through standard 120-Volt outlet
    • \n
  • Compatible with CROSS CUT multi blade accessory (sold separately) which uses 4 steel blades to achieve a superior cut

Description:
\n

\n \n

About This Product

\nThe Scarsdale 12x16 shed is the ultimate storage solution for any outdoor space. With its 7' high sidewalls, you will have plenty of room to store ladders, rakes and other tall items. A charming window package is included to bring in natural light so you can easily grab items on the go. Its fully customizable profile allows you to position the double doors on either end to best meet your needs. LP SmartSide siding resists fungal decay and termites, as well as a premium treated floor that is backed by a 15-year warranty. Handy Home sheds feature pre-cut wooden components so you will never have to waste time measuring and cutting. Even the doors are pre-assembled and pre-hung to simplify the wood shed build process. With all the money and time, you save, you can transform this 12x16 wood shed into a state-of-the-art sanctuary, workshop or backyard gym. \n

Name: Yardistry 10 x 22 Meridian Pergola
Description:
About This Pergola

\n

The 10' x 22' Meridian Pergola will add a dramatic new decorative dimension to your outdoor space. This Pergola provides enough room underneath for entertaining guests with multiple dining tables, a variety of attractive and comfortable seating arrangements or even a cocktail bar. It’s a great way to create a vacation resort-like experience at home.

\nSturdy, 5.5" by 5.5" posts with classic plinths support this Pergola while offering occupants underneath a clear, unobstructed view of the rest of your landscape. Elegantly shaped straight-line gussets support the decorative structure overhead. Its multilevel design with profiled beams and trellis ends creates an eye-catching design that wouldn’t be out of place in a Mediterranean resort or a villa in a tropical locale. While it’s beautiful, you could make it more distinctive and festive by planting creeping vines or flowering plants around it or decorating it with strings of party lights to create an enchanting effect at night. \n \nCedar has many advantages for use in outdoor structures like this Pergola. It doesn’t swell, warp or decay, is naturally insect-resistant, and is naturally beautiful. It’s constructed out of 100 percent premium exterior grade cedar, then covered in an environmentally friendly natural cedar-color stain that beautifies the wood and extends its life. All wood sections are pre-cut and pre-drilled for easier assembly. The Pergola comes with simple-to-follow illustrated instructions, and we’ve created a helpful hints video to make your installation process more manageable. Yardistry stands by the quality of its products

Name: Stratford 14 Ft. X 10 Ft. Black Steel Traditional Pergola with Sail Shade Soft Canopy
Description: \nTraditional and timeless, the Stratford Steel Pergola by Backyard Discovery brings effortless charm to your outdoor living area. This stunning patio pergola combines enduring craftsmanship with modern sophistication, featuring a stylish black finish that creates a bold, striking aesthetic. Engineered with powder-coated galvanized steel, it delivers maintenance-free durability while providing superior protection against rust, chipping, corrosion, and UV damage. Pro-Tect™ tested and proven to withstand winds up to 100 mph*, this outdoor metal pergola stands strong through adverse weather conditions. Its generous size provides plenty of room for furniture, fire pits, and outdoor décor to create the perfect space for gatherings or simply relaxing. The patented PowerPort™ features three electrical outlets and three USB ports, making it easy to power your outdoor entertainment needs. This ready-to-assemble backyard pergola kit offers step-by-step guidance with the BILT® app, for easier installation.

About This Product

\nWith the Sarasota Louvered Pergola from Backyard Discovery, the power of choice is in your hands. This modern steel pergola is designed to adapt to your backyard whims, allowing you to embrace the Sun or find pleasant shade or protection from the elements. With a few simple twists of the louver wand, you have the freedom to fully open the louvers to maximize the Sunlight. Combined with the exclusive PowerPort, featuring 3 electrical outlets and 3 USB ports, there are countless ways to enjoy your pergola, Rain or shine. It's designed to be leak-proof when fully closed, while water is discreetly channeled through the integrated gutters and downspouts. Its zero-maintenance engineering, featuring stainless steel hardware and rust-resistant welding, ensures longevity without the hassle of upkeep. Backed by a 5-Year Limited Warranty, it's a statement of durability, adaptability, and breathtaking design. \n

Name: 9000 LB Baseplate 2-Post Lift – Atlas 9KBPX
Description:
\n \nAtlas 9KBPX Baseplate Two-Post Lift  \n \nThe Atlas 9KBPX is a well-engineered baseplate-style two-post car lift designed for garages with low ceilings. Unlike overhead-style lifts, which require significant ceiling clearance, this model’s total column height of 111 ½ inches (9 feet 3 ½ inches) makes it suitable for most residential and commercial garages with ceilings as low as 9 feet 6 inches. \n \nThis lift features a “chain over roller” lifting system, ensuring smooth operation and durability. The dual hydraulic chain-drive cylinders provide reliable lifting power, while the automatic arm restraints secure vehicles in place for added safety. \n \nIt is an excellent choice for homeowners and small commercial shops looking to service a variety of vehicles, including cars, SUVs, and light-duty trucks. However, it is not recommended for lifting diesel dually or other large trucks, as it is specifically designed for lighter vehicles. \n \nKey Features Explained \n
    \n
  1. 9,000 lb. Lifting Capacity
    2. \n
\nThe Atlas 9KBPX is rated to lift vehicles weighing up to 9,000 pounds, making it ideal for a wide range of vehicles, from compact cars to mid-size SUVs and light trucks. \n
    \n
  1. Baseplate, Open-Top Style Lift
    2. \n
\nUnlike overhead lifts, this model features a baseplate design, meaning the hydraulic lines and equalizing cables run along the floor instead of over the top. This is a crucial feature for garages with low ceilings, as it eliminates the need for additional overhead space. \n
    \n
  1. Designed for Low Ceiling Clearance
    2. \n
\nWith columns standing at just 9 feet 3 ½ inches, this lift is perfect for garages with ceilings as low as 9 feet 6 inches, ensuring it can be installed in a variety of settings without requiring major modifications. \n
    \n
  1. Symmetric Arms for Balanced Lifting
    2. \n
\nThe symmetrical arm design ensures balanced weight distribution when lifting vehicles. This is beneficial for evenly distributing pressure across the lift points, making it safer and more effective for different vehicle types. \n
    \n
  1. Dual Hydraulic Chain-Drive Cylinders
    2. \n
\nThe lift operates using a dual hydraulic chain-drive system, providing consistent and powerful lifting while maintaining efficiency. This system is widely used in professional-grade lifts for its reliability and durability. \n
    \n
  1. Secondary Lock System (SLS) for Safety
    2. \n
\nThis spring-loaded safety system automatically engages in the event of a slack or broken chain, preventing sudden vehicle drops. This ensures enhanced protection for both users and vehicles. \n
    \n
  1. Automatic Arm Restraints
    2. \n
\nEach lifting arm has automatic locking mechanisms, keeping them in place once the vehicle is lifted. This prevents movement or shifting during repairs, improving overall stability and security. \n
    \n
  1. Dual Point Lock Release
    2. \n
\nThe dual lock release system allows for secure and stable vehicle lifting. The operator can easily disengage the locks simultaneously when lowering the vehicle. \n
    \n
  1. Free 8-Piece Truck Adapter Set
    2. \n
\nIncluded with the lift is an adapter set to accommodate vehicles with higher lifting points, such as SUVs and light-duty trucks. This extends the lift’s usability across a wider range of vehicles. \n
    \n
  1. Mounting Hardware Included
    2. \n
\nThe Atlas 9KBPX comes with all necessary mounting hardware, ensuring a hassle-free installation process. \n \nTechnical Specifications Breakdown \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n

Name: BendPak MDS-6LP Mid-Rise Open-Center Lift 6,000-lb. Capacity / Mid-Rise Scissor Lift / Open-Center
Description:
The BendPak MDS-6LP is a high-performance mid-rise open-center scissor lift, designed for superior accessibility and efficiency. With a 6,000 lb. lifting capacity, longer platforms, and an extended lift point spread, this lift provides a secure and stable lifting experience for a wide variety of vehicle types, including those with longer wheelbases. \n \nUnlike conventional scissor lifts that struggle to lift low-clearance vehicles, the MDS-6LP features a pivoting kicker mechanism, providing additional lift force during the first six inches of movement. This ensures smooth and reliable lifting, even from a collapsed position. \n \nThis mid-rise lift is perfect for repair shops and garages looking for a compact yet powerful lifting solution. Its removable approach ramps allow for a flush-mount setup, providing more working space around the vehicle when necessary. \n \n
\n \n

  • Extended Lift Point Spread – Accommodates vehicles with long wheelbases safely.
    • \n
  • Four Solid Steel-Scissor Support Bars – One of the strongest mid-rise lifts in its class.

    • \n
  • Solid-Steel Safety Lock Bars – Automatically engage during ascent for added security.
    • \n
  • Stainless-Steel Pneumatic Cylinders – Allow simultaneous safety lock release during descent.
    • \n
  • Push-Button Safety Lock Release – Eliminates the need for manual lock handles or release bars.
    • \n
  • Pivoting Kicker Mechanism – Provides extra lift force for low-clearance vehicles from a collapsed position.

    • \n
  • Compact Design – Perfect for garages with limited space while offering full functionality.

Name: Atlas Automotive Equipment Atlas Equipment BP10000X Commercial Grade Baseplate 10 000 Lb. Capacity 2-Post Lift
Description:
The Atlas BP10000X Two-Post Baseplate Lift is perfect for lifting heavy vehicles in low ceiling garages. With a 10,000 lb. capacity, it accommodates various vehicles, from one ton dually to compact cars, in spaces with ceilings as low as 11 feet. Featuring super-symmetric arms and a single-point lock release, it ensures efficient operation. Columns are reinforced with welded gussets for strength, while dual hydraulic chain-drive cylinders comply with ANSI standards for safety. Complete with a 12-piece truck adapter set, the lift combines robustness with a durable powder coat finish, a top choice for professionals needing space-efficient lifting solutions. Delivery of our vehicle lifts is done via LTL freight service by appointment only, due to the length of the lifts, offloading must be done with a forklift or a rollback wrecker. All shipments must be inspected for damage and/or loss before signing the carriers proof of delivery. \n
    \n

Name: MaxJax M7K Portable Two-Post Lift
Description:
The MaxJax M7K is a versatile, portable two-post lift designed to provide quick and efficient vehicle lifting while maximizing garage space. Unlike traditional two-post lifts, the MaxJax system can be set up and stored away as needed, making it perfect for home garages, small workshops, and mobile repair operations. \n \nWith a 7,000 lb. lifting capacity, it offers clear undercar access without the need for a permanent installation. Whether you’re performing oil changes, transmission work, or general vehicle maintenance, the MaxJax M7K provides a convenient, space-saving solution. \n \n

\n  \n \nThe Atlas® PV series represents the absolute best value for the customer who demands a heavy-duty professional grade two post lift at the lowest possible price. Atlas® has been manufacturing the PV series two post above ground lifts for over a decade. Thousands sold! Descriptions such as "bulletproof", built like a brick outhouse, tougher than nails, and other such euphemistic phrases are used every day to describe any of the Atlas® PV series models.The Atlas® PV12PX is a commercial grade lift designed to accommodate both long wheel-base trucks and because of a low pad height, passenger cars. The distance between the symmetrical columns is 123" with a drive through space of 109". The extra distance between the symmetrical columns will allow the widest of vehicles or vehicles with wide rearview mirrors to be lifted or driven through. The increased length of the symmetrical arms coupled with the additional height of the included peg style truck adapter set allows the operator to safely raise long wheel-base trucks with a variety of running boards. The extra height means extra clearance allowing you to lift vans and box trucks without worry.The Atlas® ATEXH-PV12PX features three height settings, the lowest setting of 150 inches or 12 foot 6 inches requires the purchase of extra short cables. \n

Name: Super73 Oracle Red Bull Racing Z Adventure Series Electric Bike
Description:
Introducing the custom Oracle Red Bull Racing x SUPER73-Z Adventure Series—a fusion of high-octane performance and retro-inspired design that transforms everyday riding into an adrenaline-fueled experience. This exceptional electric bike is tailored for riders who crave both style and speed, merging Oracle Red Bull Racing’s racing pedigree with SUPER73’s innovative engineering to deliver a ride that stands apart from the crowd. \n

A Bold Look with Racing Heritage

\nFrom the moment you lay eyes on the Retro Racer, its dynamic personality is unmistakable. Featuring a deep, midnight blue finish that exudes sophistication and mystery, this bike is adorned with exclusive Oracle Red Bull Racing-themed decals. A distinct rear number plate and eye-catching accents throughout emphasize its racing heritage, while every design element is meticulously crafted to evoke the thrill of high-speed competition. Built for riders 16 years of age and older, the Retro Racer isn’t just a bike—it’s a statement of passion and performance. \n

Engineered for High-Octane Thrills

\nEvery component of this custom electric bike is designed to deliver a performance that matches its striking appearance. Whether you’re carving through winding roads or cruising along the open highway, the Retro Racer is engineered to offer an exhilarating yet controlled ride. \n

Performance Highlights

\n
    \n
  • Top Speed: Capable of reaching 20 MPH, the bike offers the perfect balance between speed and safety.
    • \n
  • Range: Enjoy 35-45 miles of riding pleasure on a single charge, with over 35 miles of range at a consistent 20 MPH under Class-2 throttle-only operation.
    • \n
  • Charge Time: With a charge time of 7-8 hours, you’ll be ready for your next adventure in no time.
    • \n
  • Battery: Powered by a robust 720 Wh (48V 15Ah) battery that meets UL2271 compliance standards, ensuring both performance and safety.
    • \n
  • Motor: A 600W nominal motor delivers a powerful yet smooth acceleration, ideal for urban commutes and off-road excursions.
    • \n
  • Throttle & Gearing: The responsive thumb throttle combined with an 8-speed gearing system provides precise control, allowing you to adapt effortlessly to any terrain.
    • \n
\n

Dimensions Designed for Versatility

\n
    \n
  • Vehicle Weight: At just 75 lbs, the Retro Racer is lightweight enough for nimble handling, yet sturdy enough to tackle rugged paths.
    • \n
  • Overall Dimensions: Measuring 68″ in length, 28.5″ in width, and 43.5″ in height, it’s engineered to offer a stable ride in various environments.
    • \n
  • Rider Compatibility: With a rider weight limit of 325 lbs and a recommended rider height ranging from 5’1″ to 6’8″, this bike is built to accommodate a wide spectrum of riders.
    • \n
  • Seat Height: The optimized 31″ seat height ensures comfort and control, even during extended rides.
    • \n
\n

Robust Construction and Advanced Suspension

\n
    \n
  • Frame: The Retro Racer features a high-quality aluminum frame that delivers both strength and a lightweight design, perfect for rapid acceleration and agile maneuvering.
    • \n
  • Suspension: Combining a front-only suspension with a rear rigid setup, this bike strikes the ideal balance between absorbing road imperfections and maintaining a direct connection to the trail.
    • \n
  • Brakes: Equipped with hydraulic brakes, the bike offers reliable stopping power, ensuring that you can confidently navigate through busy or unpredictable environments.
    • \n
  • Tires & Tubes: Outfitted with MAXXIS SuperSucker tires—measuring 4.5 inches at the front and 5 inches at the rear—along with robust inner tubes (20″ x 4.5/5″), the Retro Racer is built to grip and conquer varied terrains.
    • \n
\n

Enhanced Visibility and Safety Features

\n
    \n
  • Lighting: With LED head and tail lights, the Retro Racer is designed for enhanced visibility during dusk, dawn, or low-light conditions, ensuring that you remain seen and safe on every journey.
    • \n
  • Horn: An integrated horn adds an extra layer of safety, alerting pedestrians and other vehicles of your presence as you speed through urban streets or scenic byways.
    • \n
\n

More Than Just a Bike

\nThe Oracle Red Bull Racing’s Retro Racer is more than a mode of transportation—it’s an experience. Its unique blend of cutting-edge technology, retro design cues, and racing DNA invites you to push the limits of everyday adventure. Whether you’re a die-hard racing fan or simply someone who values bold design and performance, this electric bike is crafted to transform your riding experience. \n \nEmbrace the thrill of the fast track and ride with the confidence of a champion. With the Retro Racer, every journey becomes a statement of speed, style, and unstoppable energy—an invitation to live life in the fast lane while enjoying the freedom of the open road. \n \n

Name: Ridstar E26 PRO Electric Bike 48V 23Ah Battery 1000W*2 Dual Motors 26*4.0inches Tires 50-75KM Max Mileage 15
Description:
Ridstar E26 PRO Electric Bike 48V 23Ah Battery 1000W*2 Dual Motors 26*4.0inches Tires 50-75KM Max Mileage 15 \n \n  \n \nThe Ridstar E26 Pro is designed for those who demand power, endurance, and versatility in an electric bike. Whether you’re commuting through city streets, taking on rugged trails, or cruising through open landscapes, this high-performance e-bike delivers an exceptional riding experience with top-tier engineering and cutting-edge technology. \n

Powerful 2000W Motor – Ride with Confidence

\nAt the heart of the Ridstar E26 Pro is its 2000W brushless motor, providing immense torque and acceleration. This powerhouse motor delivers: \nHigh-speed performance for exhilarating rides. \nEffortless hill climbing – conquer inclines with ease. \nSeamless power output – whether you’re riding on pavement, dirt roads, or trails. \n \nWith a top speed that rivals traditional motorbikes, the Ridstar E26 Pro ensures that every ride is as thrilling as it is efficient. \n

Long-Lasting 48V 23Ah Lithium Battery – Go Further on a Single Charge

\nDesigned for extended rides, this e-bike comes equipped with a high-capacity 48V 23Ah lithium battery, allowing you to travel longer distances without frequent recharging. \n \nExtended range – ideal for daily commutes and long-distance adventures. \nFast charging capability – so you can get back on the road quickly. \nReliable power output – ensuring a smooth and consistent riding experience. \n \nOn a full charge, you can explore the outdoors, commute to work, or take on challenging terrains without worrying about running out of battery. \n

Advanced Riding Comfort & Stability

\nBuilt for versatility and comfort, the Ridstar E26 Pro is designed with 26-inch fat tires that provide superior grip and traction across all types of terrain, including sand, snow, gravel, and asphalt. \n \nAll-Terrain Fat Tires: Extra-wide tires ensure stability and control, reducing vibrations and providing a smoother ride. \nFull Suspension System: Equipped with both front and rear suspension, this e-bike absorbs shocks and bumps effortlessly, making off-road rides more comfortable. \nErgonomic Design: A well-padded seat, adjustable handlebars, and a sturdy frame offer a balanced and fatigue-free riding experience, even on long journeys. \n

Smart Technology & Safety Features

\nThe Ridstar E26 Pro is designed with the latest e-bike technology to enhance convenience, safety, and control. \n \nMulti-Function LCD Display: Stay informed with real-time speed, battery level, trip distance, and more. \nHydraulic Disc Brakes: Advanced braking technology ensures quick and responsive stopping power, providing maximum control and safety. \nIntegrated LED Headlight & Taillight: Ride with confidence at night with bright illumination that enhances visibility and keeps you safe on the road. \n \nWhether you’re riding through city traffic, exploring trails, or cruising through town, the Ridstar E26 Pro keeps you in control at all times. \n

Perfect for Every Rider – Commuters, Adventurers & More

\nNo matter your riding style or purpose, the Ridstar E26 Pro adapts to your needs: \n✔ City Commuting: Avoid traffic, save on fuel costs, and ride efficiently with powerful speed and endurance. \n✔ Off-Road Exploration: Take on rugged terrains with confidence, thanks to the fat tires and robust suspension system. \n✔ Recreational Riding: Enjoy long scenic rides with an ultra-smooth and comfortable experience. \n

Why Choose the Ridstar E26 Pro?

\n✔ Powerful 2000W motor for high-speed performance. \n✔ Long-range 48V 23Ah battery for extended rides. \n✔ Full suspension & fat tires for superior comfort and stability. \n✔ Smart LCD display & hydraulic disc brakes for enhanced safety and control. \n✔ Sleek, durable, and stylish design for riders who value both aesthetics and performance. \n

Upgrade Your Ride Today!

\nExperience the freedom, power, and performance of the Ridstar E26 Pro Electric Bike. Whether you’re an urban commuter, a weekend explorer, or a thrill-seeker, this e-bike is engineered to elevate your riding experience like never before. \n \n🚴 Order yours today and redefine the way you ride! \n \n

Name: LEONX Aipas M2 Electric Mountain Bike – 1500W, 30MPH, 26″ Fat Tires
Description:
LEONX Aipas M2 Electric Mountain Bike – 1500W, 30MPH, 26″ Fat Tires \n \nWhether you’re commuting, hitting the trails, or exploring new paths, the LEONX Aipas M2 electric bike is built to deliver high performance, comfort, and reliability. With a powerful motor, long-range battery, and rugged build, this bike is designed for riders who want speed, durability, and versatility. \n \n

Powered by a removable 48V battery, it offers a range of 36–74 miles per charge, making it perfect for long rides or daily commutes.
    • \n
  • Enhanced Comfort & Control \nEnjoy smoother rides with a lockable and adjustable front suspension fork, designed for downhill and off-road terrain. Coupled with 180mm dual disc brakes, you’ll experience superior stopping power in all conditions, including rain, descents, and rugged trails.

  • Multifunctional LCD Display with USB Charging \nStay informed and connected with an LCD display that includes a USB port, so you can charge your phone while on the move. The bike supports 5 riding modes—Electric, Pedal Assist, Cruise Control, Normal Riding, and Walk Booster—along with 7-speed gear options to suit every riding style.
    • \n
  • Fat Tires for Off-Road Adventures \nBuilt with a durable MTB frame and 26″ x 4.0″ fat tires, the M2 delivers outstanding traction and stability across snow, sand, mud, and rocky paths. Integrated button controls make operation easy, and front/rear lights, horn, and turn signals enhance visibility and safety during nighttime rides.
    • \n
  • User-Friendly & Backed by Warranty \nThe M2 arrives 85% pre-assembled for easy setup and includes a tool kit and battery. Backed by a 1-year warranty on quality-related issues and lifetime technical support, LEONX ensures a worry-free riding experience.

Name: Alpinestars Supertech R10 Element ECE 06 / FIM Full Face Helmet Gloss Black / Carbon / Silver
Description:
Alpinestars Supertech R10 Element ECE 06 / FIM Full Face Helmet Gloss Black / Carbon / Silver \n \nEngineered over a decade, the Supertech R10 (S-R10) is Alpinestars’ most advanced race helmet, purpose-built for maximum safety, lightweight performance, and aerodynamic superiority. Developed in collaboration with MotoGP legends like Andrea Dovizioso, Jorge Martin, and Jack Miller, the S-R10 is a pinnacle of racing innovation. \n \n
\n \n

Key Features:

\n
    \n
  • Carbon Shell Construction \nCrafted from a multi-layer composite of 3K high-density carbon, uni-directional carbon, aramid fiber, and fiberglass, the shell provides exceptional impact energy dispersion and penetration resistance.
    • \n
  • ECE 22.06, DOT & FIM Certified \nExceeds global safety standards, offering up to 37% better linear impact and 65% better rotational impact protection than required.
    • \n
  • A-Head Fitment System \nOffers fully adjustable height and angle for a truly customized fit, maximizing comfort and performance.
    • \n
  • Aerodynamic Performance \nDeveloped through CFD simulations, wind tunnel testing, and on-track validation, the S-R10 includes two aerodynamic spoilers (Road & Race) with a patented quick-release system, reducing drag and improving high-speed stability.
    • \n
  • Optimized Ventilation \nFeatures 11 ventilation ports, including 7 intakes (3 chin, 4 top) and 4 exhausts, ensuring superior airflow and cooling even in extreme riding conditions.
    • \n
  • Advanced Shield System \nEquipped with an Optical Class 1 visor offering 220° lateral and 57° vertical visibility, anti-fog/anti-scratch coatings, a metal locking mechanism, and a quick-release, tool-less change system.
    • \n
  • Multi-Density EPS Liner \nEight-piece EPS liner with six unique densities provides optimized impact absorption and precision fitment.
    • \n
\n \n
\n \n

What’s Included:

\n
    \n
  • Supertech R10 Helmet
    • \n
  • Two shields (Dark & Clear)
    • \n
  • Standard spoiler (Road configuration)
    • \n
  • Drawstring helmet bag
    • \n
\n \n
\n \nWhether you’re chasing podiums or carving apexes, the Alpinestars Supertech R10 is the helmet trusted by MotoGP’s elite—ready to redefine your riding experience with world-class protection and unmatched performance. \n \n

Name: TUTTIO Soleil01 Electric Dirt Bike for Adults 200N.m High Torque 2000W Motor 48V 21Ah Battery Top Speed 37Mph All-terrain Electric Bicycles
Description:
TUTTIO Soleil 01 High-Torque Electric Dirt Bike
\nUnleash Your Adventure: High Performance for Off-Road Enthusiasts Aged 13 and Up（Adult、Teen）
\nTUTTIO Soleil 01 High-Torque Electric Motocross Dirt Bike, engineered for thrill-seekers and adventurers. This powerhouse electric motorcycle boasts an impressive 200N.m of torque and a robust 3000W peak brushless motor, delivering unmatched performance on any terrain. Whether you're tackling steep uphill climbs or navigating rugged off-road trails, the Soleil 01 ensures a smooth, exhilarating ride with its advanced full suspension system and heavy-duty hydraulic brakes.
\nDesigned for versatility, the Soleil 01 features a sturdy aluminum alloy frame, durable tires, and a high-capacity 48V 21Ah lithium-ion battery, offering a maximum range of 30 miles on a single charge. With a top speed of 37 mph, this dirt bike is perfect for both teenagers and adults looking to conquer the outdoors with confidence and style.
\nPerformance:
\n• Top Speed: 37Mph (60Km/h)
\n• Range: 30 miles max
\n• Motor: 48V 2000W Peak Brushless Motor 200N.m
\n• Max Climbing: 30 degrees
\n• Battery: 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion Battery
\n• Front Shocks Diameter: 40MM and 6 inch travel
\n• Suspension Type: ‎Hydraulic Suspension
\n• Rear Suspension: 500 Lbs Adjustable Oil Hydraulic Nitrogen Shock Absorber
\n• Brakes: ‎Heavy-duty hydraulic brakes
\n(Different from ordinary mountain oil brakes, it has extremely high braking force and durability to ensure that it can meet the braking requirements brought by high-power and high-torque motors.)
\n• Front Tire: 14"x2.5" Tire
\n• Rear Tire: 12"x3.0" Tire
\nComponents:
\n• Frame: ‎Aluminium Alloy
\n• Charger: 48V3A Charger
\n• Charger Voltage: 100-220V, 50-60Hz
\n• Charging Time: 0%-100% 7-8 Hours
\n• Display: 3-Speeds Display
\n• Controller: 48V 70A
\n(It delivers higher power output, with a larger current providing stronger torque for better starting speed and climbing ability. With intelligent control and easy maintenance via an optional Bluetooth adapter, it offers high controllability for professional drivers.)
\n• Ride Mode: Three-speed Zero Start
\n• Drivetrain: Chain Drive
\n• Meter: LCD 3-speed Level Smart Meter
\n• Chain: 116 links (420 chain) Heavy Duty Chain
\n• Key ignition: Yes
\nPackage Content:
\n• 1 x Electric Dirt Bike Soleil 01
\n• 1 x 48V 21Ah Lithium-Ion Battery
\n• 1 x Battery Charger
\n• 2 x Keys
\n• 1 x Tool Kit
\n• 1 x User Manual
\n• Unleash the Power:The Tuttio Soleil01 is equipped with a robust 2000W mid-drive motor, delivering a peak power of up to 3000W for an exhilarating riding experience. With 200Nm of torque, this motor ensures superior performance on steep hills and challenging terrains, allowing you to conquer any obstacle with ease. Experience the thrill of ultimate power and control.
\n• Ride Further, Worry Less:The Tuttio Soleil01 features a 48V 21AH high-capacity battery that offers a remarkable range of up to 45 miles. This battery provides 31% more capacity than other models on the market, with an additional 16% increase in range, ensuring you can go the distance without frequent recharging. Enjoy extended rides with peace of mind, thanks to quick and safe charging in just 7-8 hours.
\n• Smooth and Comfortable Ride:Equipped with an advanced hydraulic suspension system, the Tuttio Soleil01 offers a smooth and comfortable ride, even on the roughest terrain. The front fork has a 40mm diameter and 6-inch travel, while the rear suspension features adjustable oil and nitrogen shocks. Whether you’re speeding through rugged trails or cruising on city streets, this suspension system guarantees stability and comfort in every ride.
\n• Grip the Ground, Master Every Terrain:The Tuttio Soleil01 comes with large, durable tires—14"x2.5" in the front and 12"x3.0" in the rear—that provide excellent traction on various surfaces. These tires enhance stability and control, whether you're riding on gravel, mud, or wet urban roads. With superior durability and anti-slip performance, they ensure a safe and secure ride in all conditions.
\n• Precision Braking, Safety Assured:For top-notch safety, the Tuttio Soleil01 is equipped with a hydraulic braking system that offers precise and responsive braking power at any speed. Whether you’re riding fast or need to stop suddenly, this braking system provides reliable performance, ensuring your safety and protecting your bike.
\n• The Perfect Blend of Technology and Security:The Tuttio Soleil01 features a smart display with a keyed ignition system, adding an extra layer of security while providing real-time data at your fingertips. The display is clear and intuitive, showing speed, battery level, range, and more, enhancing your riding experience with advanced technology and convenience.
\n• Comfort Meets Convenience:The Tuttio Soleil01's motorcycle-style seat is designed for both comfort and practicality, with a maximum seat size of 24.4 inches, offering ample space for long rides. The seat also features a quick-release mechanism, allowing you to easily adjust or remove it as needed. This seat is the ideal choice for those who value comfort during extended rides.
\n• Fast from US Warehouse：Orders are from our US warehouse within 24 hours, ensuring your bike arrives in 3-7 business days. Enjoy the convenience of quick and reliable delivery, and hit the road right away.

Name: Aipas M2 Xterrain Electric Bike – Matte Black | All-Terrain E-Bike with Powerful Motor
Description:
\n
1500W Motor | 30MPH Top Speed | 26″ Fat Tires
\n
Whether you’re commuting, hitting the trails, or exploring new paths, the LEONX Aipas M2 electric bike is built for performance, comfort, and durability. With a powerful motor, long-range battery, and rugged build, it’s the perfect ride for anyone seeking speed, adventure, and reliability.

🔑 Key Features
\n
1500W Peak Motor & 30MPH Top Speed
\n
Equipped with a high-speed 1500W brushless rear hub motor delivering 110Nm torque for powerful climbs (up to 30°) and speeds up to 30 MPH. The removable 48V battery offers a range of 36–74 miles per charge.
\n
Enhanced Comfort & Control
\n
Ride smoother with a lockable, adjustable front suspension fork. Combined with 180mm dual disc brakes, enjoy confident braking even in rain or on rugged terrain.
\n
Smart LCD Display with USB Charging
\n
Stay informed via a multifunction LCD display and keep devices powered with an integrated USB port.
\n
5 Riding Modes + 7-Speed Gear
\n
Supports Electric, Pedal Assist, Cruise Control, Normal Ride, and Walk Assist — all with a 7-speed transmission to match your pace.

Fat Tires for Any Terrain

The sturdy MTB frame with 26″ x 4.0″ fat tires ensures traction across sand, snow, and rocks. Comes equipped with integrated lights, horn, and turn signals for night safety.

Ready to Ride with Warranty

Delivered 85% pre-assembled, includes a tool kit and battery. Backed by a 1-year warranty and lifetime technical support.
\n
📐 Specifications

Bike Type: Electric Mountain Bike
\n
Frame Material: Aluminum
\n
Suspension: Front
\n
Wheel Size: 26 inches
\n
Number of Speeds: 7
\n
Color: Black
\n
Special Features: Disc Brakes, Adjustable Suspension, LCD Display, USB Charging, Taillight
\n
Included: Electric Bike, Tool Kit, Battery

Name: Alpinestars Supertech R10 Performance Helmet
Description:
Alpinestars Supertech R10 – Elite MotoGP Race Helmet

\nEngineered over a decade, the Supertech R10 (S-R10) is Alpinestars’ most advanced race helmet, purpose-built for maximum safety, lightweight performance, and aerodynamic superiority. Developed in collaboration with MotoGP legends like Andrea Dovizioso, Jorge Martin, and Jack Miller, the S-R10 is a pinnacle of racing innovation. \n

Key Features:

\n
    \n
  • Carbon Shell Construction \nCrafted from a multi-layer composite of 3K high-density carbon, uni-directional carbon, aramid fiber, and fiberglass, the shell provides exceptional impact energy dispersion and penetration resistance.
    • \n
  • ECE 22.06, DOT & FIM Certified \nExceeds global safety standards, offering up to 37% better linear impact and 65% better rotational impact protection than required.
    • \n
  • A-Head Fitment System \nOffers fully adjustable height and angle for a truly customized fit, maximizing comfort and performance.
    • \n
  • Aerodynamic Performance \nDeveloped through CFD simulations, wind tunnel testing, and on-track validation, the S-R10 includes two aerodynamic spoilers (Road & Race) with a patented quick-release system, reducing drag and improving high-speed stability.
    • \n
  • Optimized Ventilation \nFeatures 11 ventilation ports, including 7 intakes (3 chin, 4 top) and 4 exhausts, ensuring superior airflow and cooling even in extreme riding conditions.
    • \n
  • Advanced Shield System \nEquipped with an Optical Class 1 visor offering 220° lateral and 57° vertical visibility, anti-fog/anti-scratch coatings, a metal locking mechanism, and a quick-release, tool-less change system.
    • \n
  • Multi-Density EPS Liner \nEight-piece EPS liner with six unique densities provides optimized impact absorption and precision fitment.
    • \n
\n

What’s Included:

\n
    \n
  • Supertech R10 Helmet
    • \n
  • Two shields (Dark & Clear)
    • \n
  • Standard spoiler (Road configuration)
    • \n
  • Drawstring helmet bag
    • \n
\nWhether you’re chasing podiums or carving apexes, the Alpinestars Supertech R10 is the helmet trusted by MotoGP’s elite—ready to redefine your riding experience with world-class protection and unmatched performance.

Name: Aventon Aventure 2 – Electric Fat Tire Bike for Every Adventure
Description:
The Aventon Aventure 2 is designed for riders who crave exploration without compromise. Equipped with a torque sensor, this eBike delivers a smoother, more natural ride by intuitively responding to your pedaling cadence—enhancing efficiency and rider control. \n

Key Features:

\n
    \n
  • Advanced Torque Sensor: Offers responsive pedal assist for a more natural and efficient riding experience.
    • \n
  • Customizable Speed Classes: Ships as a Class II eBike (up to 20 MPH via pedal assist & throttle), but can be unlocked to Class III, reaching up to 28 MPH with pedal assist. The throttle is removable for compliance in throttle-restricted zones.
    • \n
  • All-Terrain Performance: Tackle sand, snow, rock, or dirt with confidence thanks to 4” fat tires, a suspension fork, and a powerful rear hub motor designed for rugged environments.
    • \n
  • Pedal Assist & Throttle Modes: Choose from 4 levels of pedal assist or use the throttle on demand to cruise without pedaling.
    • \n
  • IPX4 Water Resistance: Built to withstand splashes from any direction, so you can ride through light rain and wet roads without worry. (Not submersible or pressure-wash safe.)
    • \n
  • Ready for Anything: Whether commuting, cruising, or venturing off the beaten path, the Aventure 2 adapts to your needs with comfort, power, and versatility. Take control, go further, and enjoy the freedom of electric biking like never before.
    • \n

Name: Aventon Level 2 Commuter Step-Through Electric Bike
Description:
Reimagine your daily commute with the Aventon Level 2 Step-Through—where comfort, style, and performance meet. An upgrade to Aventon’s flagship commuter eBike, the Level 2 introduces a torque sensor for a more natural and responsive ride, making your power feel multiplied with every pedal. \n \nDesigned to turn mundane rides into moments of joy, this feature-rich eBike pairs intuitive control with exceptional efficiency, so you can take on the city—and beyond—with confidence. \n

Key Features:

\n
    \n
  • 500W 48V Brushless Hub Motor: Delivers smooth acceleration and support up to 28 MPH with pedal assist.
    • \n
  • Torque Sensor Technology: Aventon’s first commuter eBike to feature a torque sensor, giving riders dynamic responsiveness and extended battery efficiency.
    • \n
  • BC280 Full-Color LCD Display: Stay connected with app sync, ride metrics, battery status, and more—all easily viewable on a backlit screen.
    • \n
  • Long Range Battery: Cruise confidently with up to 60 miles of estimated range on a single charge.
    • \n
  • Hydraulic Disc Brakes & 8-Speed Drivetrain: Provides smooth shifting and precise braking power, even on busy urban streets.
    • \n
  • Comfort-Forward Design: Features a suspension fork, cushioned step-through frame, and 27.5″ x 2.1″ tires for a plush ride across varied terrain.
    • \n
  • Commuter-Ready: Equipped with front and rear fenders, a rear cargo rack, and integrated lights for visibility and convenience.
    • \n
  • Throttle + Pedal Assist Modes: Choose your ride style—go full electric or pedal your way with assistance.

\n

Specs at a Glance:

\n
    \n
  • Weight: 62 lbs
    • \n
  • Top Speed: 28 MPH (Pedal Assist)
    • \n
  • Range: Up to 60 Miles
    • \n
  • Frame: Double-Butted Aluminum Alloy (Internal Battery)
    • \n
\nWhether you’re cruising to work, running errands, or exploring your city, the Level 2 Step-Through offers the perfect blend of power, polish, and practicality.

Name: Rad Power RadRunner 2 Electric Utility Bike
Description:
Rad Power Bikes Battery & Power System Overview

\n \n

Power your ride with confidence. The Rad Power Bikes energy system is engineered for reliable performance, compliance, and user convenience. Designed to meet UL safety standards and built for real-world use, this system delivers efficiency, safety, and range flexibility—whether you’re cruising city streets or commuting with purpose.

\n \n

Key Features:

\n
    \n
  • UL Certified Safety: Fully tested by ACT and compliant with UL 2849 and UL 2271, ensuring the highest industry standards for electrical safety and battery performance.
    • \n
  • High-Capacity Battery: 672 Wh (48V, 14Ah) lithium-ion battery delivers an estimated range of 25–45+ miles per charge, depending on rider weight, terrain, and assist level.
    • \n
  • Smart Charging: Includes a 48V, 2 Amp Rad Power Bikes smart charger that operates globally on 100V–240V AC outlets, making it travel-ready and versatile.
    • \n
  • Reliable Motor Output: A powerful 750W rear hub motor (manufacturer-rated capacity) provides strong assistance while staying under 750W ground output for Class 2 e-bike compliance.
    • \n
  • Ride Customization: Choose from 4 levels of pedal assist (PAS) via a pedal cadence sensor, plus a zero-assist mode and half-twist throttle for flexible control.
    • \n
\n \n

Additional Details

\n
    \n
  • Display: LED display for battery and assist level monitoring
    • \n
  • Lights: Front LED headlight; Rear integrated taillight with brake and flash mode
    • \n
  • Throttle: Half twist grip for effortless acceleration
    • \n
  • USB Port: Not included
    • \n
  • Class: Class 2 e-bike
    • \n
  • Battery Locking Note: Batteries come with universal keys, which are not unique to individual bikes. For maximum security, do not leave your battery unattended in public spaces. Consider removing it when parked or using an additional locking system.
    • \n
\n \n

The Rad Power system is a trusted choice for riders looking for an efficient, safe, and user-friendly e-bike experience—backed by tested performance and thoughtful design.

\n

Name: Oracle Red Bull Racing Z Adventure Series
Description:
ORACLE RED BULL RACING’S RETRO RACER \n \nIntroducing the custom Oracle Red Bull Racing x SUPER73-Z Adventure Series—a fusion of high-octane performance and retro-inspired design that transforms everyday riding into an adrenaline-fueled experience. This exceptional electric bike is tailored for riders who crave both style and speed, merging Oracle Red Bull Racing’s racing pedigree with SUPER73’s innovative engineering to deliver a ride that stands apart from the crowd. \n

A Bold Look with Racing Heritage

\nFrom the moment you lay eyes on the Retro Racer, its dynamic personality is unmistakable. Featuring a deep, midnight blue finish that exudes sophistication and mystery, this bike is adorned with exclusive Oracle Red Bull Racing-themed decals. A distinct rear number plate and eye-catching accents throughout emphasize its racing heritage, while every design element is meticulously crafted to evoke the thrill of high-speed competition. Built for riders 16 years of age and older, the Retro Racer isn’t just a bike—it’s a statement of passion and performance. \n

Engineered for High-Octane Thrills

\nEvery component of this custom electric bike is designed to deliver a performance that matches its striking appearance. Whether you’re carving through winding roads or cruising along the open highway, the Retro Racer is engineered to offer an exhilarating yet controlled ride. \n

Performance Highlights

\n
    \n
  • Top Speed: Capable of reaching 20 MPH, the bike offers the perfect balance between speed and safety.
    • \n
  • Range: Enjoy 35-45 miles of riding pleasure on a single charge, with over 35 miles of range at a consistent 20 MPH under Class-2 throttle-only operation.
    • \n
  • Charge Time: With a charge time of 7-8 hours, you’ll be ready for your next adventure in no time.
    • \n
  • Battery: Powered by a robust 720 Wh (48V 15Ah) battery that meets UL2271 compliance standards, ensuring both performance and safety.
    • \n
  • Motor: A 600W nominal motor delivers a powerful yet smooth acceleration, ideal for urban commutes and off-road excursions.
    • \n
  • Throttle & Gearing: The responsive thumb throttle combined with an 8-speed gearing system provides precise control, allowing you to adapt effortlessly to any terrain.
    • \n
\n

Dimensions Designed for Versatility

\n
    \n
  • Vehicle Weight: At just 75 lbs, the Retro Racer is lightweight enough for nimble handling, yet sturdy enough to tackle rugged paths.
    • \n
  • Overall Dimensions: Measuring 68″ in length, 28.5″ in width, and 43.5″ in height, it’s engineered to offer a stable ride in various environments.
    • \n
  • Rider Compatibility: With a rider weight limit of 325 lbs and a recommended rider height ranging from 5’1″ to 6’8″, this bike is built to accommodate a wide spectrum of riders.
    • \n
  • Seat Height: The optimized 31″ seat height ensures comfort and control, even during extended rides.
    • \n
\n

Robust Construction and Advanced Suspension

\n
    \n
  • Frame: The Retro Racer features a high-quality aluminum frame that delivers both strength and a lightweight design, perfect for rapid acceleration and agile maneuvering.
    • \n
  • Suspension: Combining a front-only suspension with a rear rigid setup, this bike strikes the ideal balance between absorbing road imperfections and maintaining a direct connection to the trail.
    • \n
  • Brakes: Equipped with hydraulic brakes, the bike offers reliable stopping power, ensuring that you can confidently navigate through busy or unpredictable environments.
    • \n
  • Tires & Tubes: Outfitted with MAXXIS SuperSucker tires—measuring 4.5 inches at the front and 5 inches at the rear—along with robust inner tubes (20″ x 4.5/5″), the Retro Racer is built to grip and conquer varied terrains.
    • \n
\n

Enhanced Visibility and Safety Features

\n
    \n
  • Lighting: With LED head and tail lights, the Retro Racer is designed for enhanced visibility during dusk, dawn, or low-light conditions, ensuring that you remain seen and safe on every journey.
    • \n
  • Horn: An integrated horn adds an extra layer of safety, alerting pedestrians and other vehicles of your presence as you speed through urban streets or scenic byways.
    • \n
\n

More Than Just a Bike

\nThe Oracle Red Bull Racing’s Retro Racer is more than a mode of transportation—it’s an experience. Its unique blend of cutting-edge technology, retro design cues, and racing DNA invites you to push the limits of everyday adventure. Whether you’re a die-hard racing fan or simply someone who values bold design and performance, this electric bike is crafted to transform your riding experience. \n \nEmbrace the thrill of the fast track and ride with the confidence of a champion. With the Retro Racer, every journey becomes a statement of speed, style, and unstoppable energy—an invitation to live life in the fast lane while enjoying the freedom of the open road.

Name: Ridstar DC26 2000W Folding Fat Tire Mountain Electric Bike
Description:
RIDSTAR DC26 2000W FOLDING FAT TIRE MOUNTAIN ELECTRIC BIKE

\n \n

Engineered for riders who demand raw power and versatility, the Ridstar DC26 is a rugged, foldable e-bike built to tackle challenging mountain trails and urban roads alike. With its robust 2000W brushless motor and high-capacity battery, this electric bike delivers exceptional performance on even the steepest inclines.

\n \n

Uncompromising Performance

\n \n
    \n
  • Powerful 2000W Motor: Conquer demanding terrains with a high-torque motor that makes steep slopes (up to 45°) and rough trails feel effortless.
    • \n
  • Extended Range Battery: Featuring a 48V/23AH lithium-ion battery, the DC26 offers a long-range ride with a full charge in just 4 to 6 hours.
    • \n
  • Versatile Shifting: Equipped with a 7-speed shifting system, you can easily adapt to varying riding conditions for optimum control.
    • \n
  • Top Speed: Enjoy a smooth ride with a maximum speed of 31 MPH, perfectly balancing power and safety.

\n \n

Intelligent Design & Rugged Features

\n \n
    \n

Name: SUPER73-R Adventure Series Core
Description:
AN EBIKE FOR THE ROAD WARRIORS \n \nMeet the pinnacle of our Adventure Series—a flagship model engineered for those who demand nothing but the best.     • \n
  • Magura MT5e Brakes: Command your ride with precision using advanced Magura MT5e brakes, delivering robust, reliable stopping power in any situation.
    • \n
  • Full Suspension & Enhanced Weight Distribution: Tackle varied terrain with confidence thanks to fully adjustable front and rear suspension paired with optimized weight distribution for superior handling.

  • High-Performance Motor & Throttle: Powered by a 750W nominal motor and responsive thumb throttle, this e-bike accelerates smoothly while maintaining a top speed of 20 MPH.

\n

\n

Performance

\n
    \n
  • Top Speed: 20 MPH

  • Charge Time: 6-7 hrs

  • Motor: 750W nominal
    • \n
  • Throttle: Thumb Throttle

  • Gearing & Rear Derailleur: 8 speed

Dimensions

Frameset

Name: SUPER73-Z Adventure Series LE
Description:
' \n \n

THE BIKE YOU DIDN’T SEE COMING

\n \n

Introducing the all-new SUPER73-Z Adventure Limited Edition, a bike that masterfully combines innovative design with rugged performance to elevate your outdoor adventures. Conceived for the daring rider who thrives on the unpredictable and loves exploring uncharted terrains, this bike doesn’t just stand out—it redefines what an electric adventure bike can be.

\n \n

A Design That Demands Attention

\n \n

At first glance, you’ll notice the striking, hydro-dipped frame. The camouflage colorway isn’t just for aesthetics—it’s a bold statement that whispers stealth and rugged capability. The attention to detail extends across the entire bike, from the meticulously crafted aluminum frame to the distinctive GRZLY tires that promise a unique blend of durability and performance. Whether you’re cruising down a forest trail or making your way through urban landscapes, this design is engineered to attract admiring glances and spark conversations among fellow riders.

\n \n

Engineered for the Adventurous Spirit

\n \n

This SUPER73 isn’t just about looks. It’s a performance machine built with adventure in mind:

\n \n

Performance that Excites

\n
    \n
  • Top Speed: Capable of reaching up to 20 MPH, the bike delivers a smooth and exhilarating ride.
    • \n
  • Range: With an impressive range of 35-45 miles per charge, you can confidently embark on longer journeys. Enjoy over 35 miles of range at a steady 20 MPH under Class-2 throttle-only operation, ensuring that you get the most out of every ride.
    • \n
  • Battery & Charging: The 720 Wh battery (48V 15Ah) is designed for efficiency and reliability, providing the power you need. With a charge time of 7-8 hours, you’re set for daily adventures.
    • \n
  • Motor & Throttle: A 600W nominal motor, paired with a thumb throttle, delivers a responsive and engaging experience, giving you precise control over your speed and acceleration.
    • \n
  • Gearing & Rear Derailleur: The 8-speed kit ensures that you have the right gear for every situation, from steep climbs to smooth, straight roads.
    • \n
\n \n

Dimensions Crafted for Comfort and Control

\n
    \n
  • Vehicle Weight: Weighing just 75 lbs, this bike strikes the perfect balance between lightness and robustness, making it nimble enough for quick maneuvers yet sturdy enough to handle rugged terrain.
    • \n
  • Size & Fit: With overall dimensions of 68″ x 28.5″ x 43.5″, this bike accommodates a wide range of riding conditions. It comes with a rider weight limit of up to 325 lbs and is recommended for riders between 5’1″ and 6’8″, ensuring a comfortable fit for most adventurers.
    • \n
  • Seat Height: Set at 31″, the seat height is optimized for stability and rider control, letting you enjoy long rides without compromising on comfort.
    • \n
\n \n

The Frame and Suspension: Built to Conquer

\n
    \n
  • Frame: Constructed from high-quality aluminum, the frame is designed for longevity, providing a lightweight yet durable foundation.
    • \n
  • Suspension: The bike features front-only suspension paired with a rear rigid design. This combination offers an ideal balance for off-road stability while keeping the structure robust and straightforward.
    • \n
  • Brakes: Equipped with Tektro 2-piston hydraulic brakes, safety and stopping power are paramount, giving you the confidence to ride at speed even in unpredictable conditions.
    • \n
  • Tires & Tubes: The aggressive GRZLY tires—measuring 4.5 inches at the front and 5 inches at the rear—are built for traction on varied surfaces. The 20″ x 4.5/5″ inner tubes add to the overall resilience and performance.
    • \n
\n \n

Illumination and Signaling

\n
    \n
  • Lights: Both the head light and tail light are powered by LED technology, ensuring clear visibility during night rides or low-light conditions. These high-performance lights make your presence known while enhancing safety.
    • \n
  • Horn: A built-in horn provides an additional safety feature, alerting pedestrians and other vehicles to your presence as you navigate through busy environments.
    • \n
\n \n

More Than Just a Bike

\n \n

Every aspect of the SUPER73-Z Adventure Limited Edition has been thoughtfully engineered for riders 16 years of age and older. This bike is more than a mode of transportation—it’s an invitation to experience the outdoors with unmatched style and confidence. Whether you’re tackling rugged trails, exploring scenic routes, or simply enjoying the thrill of a spontaneous ride, this bike is designed to keep up with your adventurous lifestyle.

\n \n

Embrace the wild side of riding and redefine your limits with a bike that’s as bold and dynamic as you are. Get ready to transform your everyday journey into an extraordinary adventure—because sometimes, the best things are the ones you never saw coming.

\n

AN EBIKE THAT’S THE LIFE OF THE BLOCK PARTY \n \nImagine a bike even more special than the Z Miami—enter the Z Miami SE. Name: 1.5 HP Tire Changer Wheel Balancer Machine Combo Rim Clamp 14″-28″

' \n \n

1.5 HP Tire Changer & Wheel Balancer Machine Combo – Model 806B & 70D

\n \n

The 1.5 HP Tire Changer & Wheel Balancer Machine Combo 806B & 70D is an economical and practical solution for automotive shops and home garages looking for efficient tire changing and precise wheel balancing. Designed to handle a wide range of rim sizes and tire types, this combo set delivers reliable performance, durability, and user-friendly operation.

\n \n

806B Tire Changer Features

\n
    \n
  • Economical & Practical Design – Perfect for small to medium-sized shops and home garages.
    • \n
  • High-Density Aluminum Piston (Spade Cylinder) – Increases durability and extends service life.
    • \n
  • Precision Steel Cast Clamping Jaws – Provides firm grip and long-lasting durability.
    • \n
  • Optional Motorcycle Adapter Available – Expands compatibility for motorcycle tires.
    • \n
  • Enhanced Inner Box Structure – Prevents mechanical deformation and increases lifespan.
    • \n
  • Protective Clamping Jaw Sleeve – Protects tires and rims from damage.
    • \n
  • Air Bead Blaster Function – Ensures fast and efficient bead seating.
    • \n
  • Power Supply: 110V
    • \n

With a 10,000 lb. lifting capacity, this versatile lift provides quick access to wheels, brakes, and undercar repairs, making it an essential tool for professional service shops and garages. \n \nFeaturing four parallelogram frame support bars, dual hydraulic cylinders, and a durable rubber-topped platform, the LR-10000 delivers unmatched stability, strength, and ease of use. Built-in storage trays and side rails ensure maximum convenience and workspace efficiency. \n

Name: 10,000 LB Heavy Duty 2-Post Lift
Description:
Heavy-Duty CE Certified Two-Post Lift \n \nThis CE Certified two-post lift is designed for superior strength, safety, and efficiency, making it ideal for professional auto repair shops and serious automotive enthusiasts. Built with high-quality materials and advanced safety features, this lift ensures reliable operation, easy maintenance, and long-term durability. \n \nWith a robust hydraulic system, reinforced steel structure, and multiple safety mechanisms, this lift provides exceptional lifting performance while protecting both vehicles and operators. \n

Key Features & Benefits

\n
    \n

    • 150% Static Load Capacity
      • \n
    \n

  • Easy Operation & Maintenance – Designed for efficiency and user convenience.

    • \n

      • \n
    • Use the manual lever to lower the vehicle safely.

    • \n
  • Automatic Arm Lock Restraints – Keeps lift arms securely locked in place.
    • \n

    • \n
  • Up-Limit Switch – Protects cylinders from exceeding safe working limits.
    • \n
  • Heavy-Duty 3/8″ Diameter Cable & 5″ Pulley – Reduces stress during synchronization and extends cable lifespan.
    • \n
  • Ultra-High Molecular Self-Lubricating Nylon Slider – Ensures smooth carriage movement up and down.
    • \n
\n

Why Choose This Two-Post Lift?

\nThis CE Certified two-post lift is engineered for maximum safety, reliability, and efficiency. Its reinforced structure, high-performance hydraulic system, and multiple safety features make it an ideal choice for professional and home garages looking for premium lifting capabilities. \n \nWith third-party tested load capacity, smooth lifting operation, and durable materials, this lift delivers unmatched performance for automotive maintenance and repair.

Name: 110V Portable Two-Post Garage Lift

MaxJax M7K Portable Two-Post Lift \n \nThe MaxJax M7K is a versatile, portable two-post lift designed to provide quick and efficient vehicle lifting while maximizing garage space. Unlike traditional two-post lifts, the MaxJax system can be set up and stored away as needed, making it perfect for home garages, small workshops, and mobile repair operations. \n \nWith a 7,000 lb. lifting capacity, it offers clear undercar access without the need for a permanent installation. Whether you’re performing oil changes, transmission work, or general vehicle maintenance, the MaxJax M7K provides a convenient, space-saving solution. \n

Key Features & Benefits

This mid-rise lift is perfect for repair shops and garages seeking a compact yet powerful lifting solution. Its removable approach ramps allow for a flush-mount setup, giving more working space around the vehicle when needed.

Name: Ford 6.7L CP4 to DCR Pump Conversion
Description:
Reliable Fuel System Upgrade for Ford Super Duty Trucks (2011–2025) \n \nThe factory-installed CP4 high-pressure fuel pump in 2011 to current Ford Super Duty diesel trucks has earned a reputation for sudden failures, leading to power loss and fuel system damage that can result in repairs exceeding $10,000. \n \nThis widespread issue has resulted in recalls and legal action against manufacturers using CP4 pumps. To provide a long-term solution, S&S Diesel Motorsport™, the common rail diesel injection experts, teamed up with PurePower Technologies, Inc.®—the aftermarket division of legendary fuel system maker Stanadyne®. \n \nThe result is a revolutionary and durable solution: the Ford 6.7L CP4 to DCR Pump Conversion. This plug-and-play replacement offers OE fit and function while eliminating the risks associated with the CP4 pump. \n

Key Benefits & Features

\n
    \n
  • Eliminates CP4 Failure Risks – Prevents catastrophic fuel system failure and costly repairs.
    • \n
  • OE Fit & Function – Seamless integration into existing systems; no custom tuning or major modifications needed.
    • \n
  • Cost-Effective Solution – Priced at $1,990 USD, it can save truck owners $10,000 to $15,000 in repair costs.
    • \n
  • Emissions Compliant – Certified under CARB EO #D-756-7.
    • \n
  • Durable & Reliable – Engineered by top-tier diesel fuel system experts to outperform the stock CP4 pump.
    • \n
  • Wide Compatibility – Fits 2011–2025 Ford F250 to F750 diesel trucks with the 6.7L Power Stroke engine.
    • \n
  • Peace of Mind – Designed to keep your workhorse running without the fear of sudden pump failure.
    • \n
\n

Why Choose the S&S Diesel Motorsport CP4 to DCR Conversion?

\nThis conversion is the only OE-quality alternative to the faulty CP4 system. Whether you're a fleet operator or daily driver, it ensures your truck stays on the road, not in the shop. Backed by industry leaders and engineered with precision, the DCR pump is a smart investment in performance, safety, and reliability. \n \nUpgrade your Ford Super Duty with the S&S Diesel CP4 to DCR Pump Conversion – because you can’t afford to be stranded.

Product Description The Sunmthink 12×20 ft Hardtop Gazebo is designed for durability, style, and year-round functionality. Key Features

  • UV-Blocking Polycarbonate Panels: The double-layer hardtop roof includes 6mm PC panels with triple protection layers. These panels are waterproof, moisture-proof, and designed to block UV rays, reducing heat and mildew buildup. (Note: PC panels block UV light, not high temperatures or strong sunlight.)
  • Double Roof Design with 3 Hooks: The ventilated double-roof design helps reduce wind pressure and promotes air circulation. Includes:
    • 1 central U-shaped hook (max load: 10kg) – perfect for lights or fans
    • 2 additional hooks on beams – ideal for decorations or small accessories
  • Privacy Curtains & Mosquito Netting: Dual-layer system includes:
    • Polyester-coated privacy curtains for sunlight resistance
    • Built-in mosquito netting to prevent bites while maintaining airflow
    Smooth-gliding rails allow you to use either or both layers easily.
  • All-Season Sturdy Frame: Features a full aluminum frame with waterproof powder coating for enhanced wind and load resistance. Includes:
    • 4 ground posts for stability
    • Expansion screws for secure anchoring
With its premium construction and spacious design, the Sunmthink 12×20 ft Hardtop Gazebo brings year-round comfort, protection, and elegance to your outdoor gatherings.

Name: Sole E25 Elliptical
Description:
SOLE E25 ELLIPTICAL 2023

\nTransform your home fitness routine with the Sole E25 Elliptical 2023—a premium machine engineered for smooth, low-impact workouts that deliver high-intensity results without straining your joints. Perfect for users of all fitness levels, this elliptical combines advanced technology, customizable resistance, and ergonomic design to help you burn calories, build endurance, and improve overall cardiovascular health—all within the comfort of your home. \n

Performance & Features

\n
    \n
  • Smooth, Low-Impact Motion: Enjoy a natural, fluid stride that minimizes joint stress while providing an effective cardiovascular workout.
    • \n
  • Customizable Resistance: With multiple resistance levels and a variety of built-in workout programs, tailor your training intensity to meet your fitness goals—whether you’re focusing on fat burn, endurance, or interval training.
    • \n
  • Adjustable Stride Length: The ergonomically designed stride is adjustable to suit a range of body types, ensuring a comfortable and personalized workout experience.
    • \n
\n

Advanced Technology

\n
    \n
  • Intuitive Digital Console: Monitor key workout metrics such as speed, distance, calories burned, and heart rate on an easy-to-read digital display. Stay motivated by tracking your progress in real time.
    • \n
  • Built-In Workout Programs: Choose from a selection of pre-set programs crafted by fitness experts to keep your routine varied and challenging, from steady-state cardio to high-intensity interval training (HIIT).
    • \n
  • Quiet Operation: Engineered for a quiet workout, the Sole E25 allows you to exercise any time of day without disturbing your household.
    • \n
\n

User Comfort & Convenience

\n
    \n
  • Ergonomic Design: Padded handlebars and a comfortable, adjustable seat ensure that you remain supported and relaxed during extended workouts.
    • \n
  • Space-Saving Build: With its sleek, modern design and compact footprint, the E25 fits seamlessly into any home gym or living space.
    • \n
  • Easy Assembly & Maintenance: Designed with convenience in mind, this elliptical offers straightforward assembly and low maintenance, allowing you to focus on your fitness goals.
    • \n
\n

Durability & Build Quality

\n
    \n
  • Sturdy Construction: Crafted with high-quality materials and a robust frame, the Sole E25 is built to deliver consistent performance and withstand the rigors of daily use.
    • \n
  • Reliable Performance: With components engineered for longevity, this elliptical ensures a dependable, effective workout session after session.
    • \n
\n

The Ultimate Home Workout Experience

\nThe Sole E25 Elliptical 2023 is your gateway to achieving a healthier lifestyle with effective, low-impact workouts tailored to your unique fitness journey. Whether you’re a seasoned athlete or just starting out, the E25 offers a smooth, customizable exercise experience that helps you build strength, endurance, and cardiovascular health—all while being gentle on your joints. \n \nUpgrade your home gym with the Sole E25 and embrace a new standard in elliptical training that combines innovation, performance, and comfort for the ultimate fitness experience.

\nBuilt in Greeneville, TN, the new Z325E is designed for improved ride quality and durability with a tougher frame and large front tires. Easy to operate, the 24 HP V-Twin John Deere engine delivers a smooth, powerful performance. The 48-in. (122-cm) forged Accel Deep mower deck produces a superior lawn at higher mowing speeds and is easily equipped to bag or mulch.

The adjustable self propelled function allows you to choose your pace of cut. The unit features a 21.5 in. steel deck and a high-output brushless direct drive motor, delivering powerful performance for up to 50-minutes of runtime. Equipped with Auto Sensing technology the unit increases torque in high overgrowth. with 6 cutting heights that range from 1.5 in. to 4.0 in., you can handle any size lawn. The 20-Volt MAX Brushless Handheld Blower DCBL722B provides the ability to clear debris with an air volume of up to 450 cu. ft. per minute and up to 125 miles per hour with the concentrator nozzle.
