Name: Rambo Kids 20 Trailbreaker Electric Bike 24V 250W Hub Motor Financing
Description:
'
\n  
\nDescription
\n
\nThe 20″ Trailbreaker is set up to not only let your kids enjoy the outdoors on an ebike but also assist them on taking longer rides with you. This 20 inch ebike has the power to climb and the battery range to let your kid keep up on the trails. The 250w hub driven motor delivers throttle-controlled power on demand. It’s durable design and rugged build will provide years of entertainment. With safety in mind we’ve specially designed durable aluminum forged wheels and drum brake with electric motor cut off.
\n*Recommended for ages 5-10 years old.
\n*Weight Limit: 120lbs
\n*Each bike comes with four sets of colored decals
\n
\nWith an integrated battery into the frame, we’re able to provide a larger capacity then other Kid’s ebikes at 24v 10.5aH. It’s protected from crashes, falls, and the elements. With an average range of up to 15 miles, you’re kids are ready for endless fun!
\n
\n
\nThe Trailbreaker has a 250w motor that has a top speed of around 17mph. Fast enough to give the kids a thrill but slow enough to keep them under control. The Mechanical disk brakes include an activated motor cutoff for quick and easy stopping.
\n
\nIntroducing an easy 1 click on and off application. We’ve kept it simple for kids to easily use it without the help of parents. With a quick view battery indicator even a child will know when the batteries getting low and it’s time to head in for lunch and recharge!
\n
\nJust like a dirt bike, the Rambo Kid’s ebikes delivers throttle-controlled power on demand.  With the 20″ x 1.95″ tires and throttle-controlled power, the Trailbreaker is designed for years of entertainment.
\n
\nWith front and rear disk brakes, your kids have the ability to safely stop as fast as possible or have a little fun and let the rear tire come to a skidding tail whip. Whichever they want, the dual brakes are for their safety.
\n

Name: Revi Bikes Cheetah 48V 750W Hub Motor Fat Tire Electric Cruiser Bike
Description:
'
\n  
\n
\n
\n
\nAre you looking for an e-bike that provides power, speed and style? Well look no further, the Revi Bikes Cheetah provides the style you are looking for while being packed with power from just a turn of throttle. The Revi Bikes Cheetah gets you up to speed very quickly and zips from a standstill to moving position. The big front light allows you to see clearly while taking your night cruise through town. 
\n 
\nThe Revi Cheetah comes with a 750W Bafang rear hub motor. Tekro hydraulic disc brakes front and back allow for quick and safe stopping power.  Powering the bike is one of two battery options, both rated at 48 volts. You can opt for the default pack, which offers 13.5 amp hours, or pay a bit more for the 17.5 amp hour pack to go further. The weight difference is roughly one pound, and the form factor is exactly the same.
\n  
\nRevi Bikes engineered the handlebars to allow for a proper seating position for maximized comfort. While at a stopped position both feet can touch the ground. This beautifully engineered bike allows for comfort, speed and power to get you where you need to go safe and quick.
\n

Name: John Deere Z345R ZTrak 42-in 22-HP Lawn Mower
Description:
'
\n
\n  
\n
\nAbout This Product
\nBuilt in Greeneville, TN, all John Deere ZTrak Residential Zero-Turn Radius Mowers offer exceptional quality, performance, and comfort. Perfect for residential customers looking for an efficient, powerful, and precise mowing experience, the Z345M features advanced design and features to deliver a superior mowing experience. Powered by a 22 HP V-Twin John Deere engine, it offers smooth, consistent performance. The 42-inch Accel Deep Mower Deck is engineered for higher mowing speeds with excellent cut quality and can easily switch between mulching or bagging.
\n
\nKey Features
\n    • 22 HP V-Twin John Deere Engine:
\n        ◦ Delivers powerful and smooth performance for tougher mowing conditions.
\n        ◦ Reliable and fuel-efficient to ensure optimal operation over long periods.
\n    • 42-inch Accel Deep Mower Deck:
\n        ◦ High-performance design allows you to mow faster without sacrificing cut quality.
\n        ◦ Designed for superior grass processing, providing a cleaner and more even cut.
\n        ◦ Versatile deck can be easily adjusted to mulch or bag grass clippings.
\n    • Hand Lift Deck Adjustment:
\n        ◦ Allows effortless height adjustment between 1 to 4 inches.
\n        ◦ Conveniently locks the deck in a raised or transport position for easy storage or clearing obstacles.
\n    • Dual EZT Transmissions:
\n        ◦ Provides smooth acceleration and a precise driving experience.
\n        ◦ Large 18-inch drive tires offer excellent traction, even on uneven terrain.
\n        ◦ Enable mowing speeds up to 7 mph, allowing you to finish jobs faster.
\n    • Heavy-Duty Welded Steel Frame:
\n        ◦ Formed and welded for maximum strength and durability.
\n        ◦ Built to handle tough mowing conditions and last season after season.
\n    • Ergonomically Designed Foot Platform:
\n        ◦ Foot platform easily flips up, providing quick access to the mower deck for maintenance and cleaning.
\n        ◦ Simplifies routine upkeep, keeping your mower in optimal working condition.
\n    • Comfortable 18-inch Medium Back Seat with Armrests:
\n        ◦ Adjustable seat for optimal comfort with forward and backward positioning.
\n        ◦ Provides the right support for extended mowing sessions.
\n    • Multiple Position Motion Control Levers:
\n        ◦ Designed for quick, easy adjustments, enhancing comfort and control.
\n        ◦ Allows for on-the-go tracking adjustments when levers become misaligned.
\n    • MowerPlus App Compatibility:
\n        ◦ Monitor engine hours and fuel level directly from your smartphone.
\n        ◦ Helps with scheduling maintenance and staying on top of mower performance.
\n    • Pre-Delivery Inspection:
\n        ◦ John Deere technicians perform a thorough 10-point pre-delivery inspection for quality assurance.
\n        ◦ Ensures the mower is in perfect condition right from the start.
\n    • Optional Bagger (Sold Separately):
\n        ◦ BG20755 bagger option available for added grass collection.
\n        ◦ Ideal for homeowners who prefer a cleaner, more manicured lawn.
\n    • 2.1-Gallon Fuel Tank:
\n        ◦ Large capacity for long mowing sessions without frequent refueling.
\n        ◦ Designed to increase operational time, reducing interruptions during mowing.
\n    • 2-Year Bumper-to-Bumper Warranty:
\n        ◦ Full coverage for peace of mind, protecting your mower against unexpected repairs.
\n        ◦ Easy registration at johndeere/warranty registration for warranty activation.
\n    • Enhanced Safety Features:
\n        ◦ Safety interlock system ensures the mower can only be started with the parking brake engaged.
\n        ◦ Designed to prevent accidental movement when getting off the mower.
\n    • Easy to Maneuver:
\n        ◦ Zero-turn radius allows for precise control in tight spaces and around obstacles.
\n        ◦ Perfect for residential yards with trees, bushes, or flower beds.
\n    • Fuel Efficiency:
\n        ◦ Efficient engine design ensures you get more mowing done per tank of fuel.
\n        ◦ Lower fuel consumption compared to many other lawnmowers in the same category.
\n    • All-Season Durability:
\n        ◦ Built to handle tough weather conditions, from hot summer mowing to cooler fall cleanup.
\n        ◦ Durable components designed to endure varying outdoor elements.
\n

\n    • Premium 24 HP V-twin extended life series engine
\n    • 60 in. Accel deep deck, improved cut quality at higher speeds
\n    • Large 4.5 gallon fuel tank increases running time
\nBuilt in Greeneville, TN All John Deere ZTrak Residential Zero-Turn Radius Mowers offer unmatched quality, performance and comfort. They are designed for use by residential customers looking for an efficient mowing machine with exceptional maneuverability and trimming capability. The new Z515E has a 24 HP V-Twin ELS John Deere engine that features an advanced filtration system for enhanced performance and long engine life. It has plenty of power to handle tough mowing conditions. The 60 in. (152 cm) Accel Deep Mower Deck delivers superior cut quality at higher mowing speeds and can be easily equipped to bag or mulch. The 18 in. cut and sewn seat with thick foam padding is built for superior ride comfort with armrests for extra support. The operator station has been designed for improved comfort, visibility and ease of use that includes an easy-to-read fuel gauge and hour meter. The standard foldable ROPS (Roll Over Protection Structure) and retractable seat belt on the Z515E work in conjunction to provide a protective zone around the operator.
\n    • For questions about service and repair, please call the John Deere Customer Contact Center at 800-537-8233 or reference the Service & Repair document
\n    • 24 HP V-Twin ELS John Deere engine has plenty of power to handle tough mowing conditions
\n    • “It’s not how fast you mow, it’s how well you mow fast”- mow well fast with the 60 in. Accel Deep Mower Deck – engineered to deliver superior cut quality and grass processing at higher mowing speeds, offers 13 cutting heights ranging from 1-4 in.
\n    • Large 4.5 gallon fuel tank increases running time and the electronic fuel gauge allows customers to easily see how much fuel is left in the tank
\n    • Multiple position motion control levers and on the go tracking adjustment allows user to easily adjust from the seat when motion levers are out of alignment
\n    • 18 in. cut and sewn seat with thick foam padding and large 22 in. rear tires greatly improve ride quality
\n    • ZTrak mowers are designed with a heavy-duty formed and welded steel frame for strength and reliability
\n    • 12-Volt charging port, color coded operating controls, standard hour meter, cup holder and storage compartment are added for operator convenience and comfort
\n    • Foot platform flips up for easy access to the top of mower deck for easy maintenance and cleaning
\n    • Hassle Free Ownership – a John Deere authorized technician will perform a thorough 10 Point Pre-Delivery Inspection on all new John Deere mowers prior to sale
\n    • Download the The MowerPlus app to easily view engine hours and fuel level
\n    • Be sure to register your 4 year/300 hour bumper to bumper warranty at www.johndeere.com/warrantyregistration and stay connected with your servicing John Deere dealer
\n    • The engine horsepower and torque information are provided by the engine manufacturer to be used for comparison purposes only. Actual operating horsepower and torque will be less. Refer to the manufacturer’s website for additional information.
\n    • Engine horsepower and torque information are provided by the engine manufacturer to be used for comparison purposes only, actual operating horsepower and torque will be less; refer to the manufacturer’s website for additional information

\nDescription
\nAt our store, we proudly offer the powerful and versatile Z315E 42-inch, 20 HP GAS Dual Hydrostatic Zero-Turn Riding Mower BG21296. Here’s why you can be 99% sure that choosing us will be the best decision for your purchase:
\n    1. Superior Performance: The Z315E is equipped with a robust 20 HP GAS engine, delivering exceptional power and efficiency for your lawn care needs. Experience smooth and precise cutting performance, even in challenging terrains.
\n    2. Zero-Turn Maneuverability: With dual hydrostatic transmission, the Z315E provides effortless maneuverability and zero-turn capabilities. Effortlessly navigate around obstacles, trees, and landscaping features, saving you time and effort.
\n    3. Quality Craftsmanship: Built with durable materials and advanced engineering, the Z315E is designed to withstand the demands of heavy-duty use. Its sturdy construction ensures longevity and reliability, giving you peace of mind for years to come.
\n    4. Comfortable Operation: Enjoy a comfortable mowing experience with the Z315E’s ergonomic design. The adjustable seat, easy-to-use controls, and smooth operation make mowing a pleasure. Say goodbye to fatigue and hello to a comfortable ride.
\n    5. Versatile Cutting Options: Tailor your lawn care routine with versatile cutting options. Whether you prefer mulching, bagging, or rear discharge, the Z315E offers adjustable cutting heights and versatile settings to meet your specific needs.
\n    6. Easy Maintenance: We understand that convenience matters. The Z315E is designed for easy maintenance, with accessible service points and user-friendly features. Spend less time on upkeep and more time enjoying a beautifully manicured lawn.
\n    7. Expert Guidance: Our knowledgeable team is here to provide expert guidance and assistance throughout your buying journey. We’ll help you choose the right equipment, answer your questions, and provide valuable tips for optimal performance.
\n    8. Customer Satisfaction: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We go the extra mile to ensure that every customer is satisfied with their purchase. From competitive pricing to exceptional customer service, we aim to exceed your expectations.

Name: Zero-Turn Mower 54 in. Complete Bagging System for Z500 Series
Description:
'
\nDescription  
\n  
\nThe Z515E 54 in. complete bagging system includes everything needed to successfully bag grass clippings. Included is an attachment bar/hitch, a High-Performance (HP) PowerFlow Blower, a chute and a hopper assembly. The High-Performance PowerFlow Blower efficiently moves material up the chute and into the hopper/bagger. The chute provides a smooth flow of material and includes a convenient handle and a fill indicator to notify the operator when the bags are getting full. The hopper/bagger design provides efficient performance and easy-to-empty bags with a generous, 6.5-bushel capacity. This bagger is compatible with the Z515E and the Z530M with a 54 in. mowing deck. Weights are required for safe operation and are included.

(137-cm) forged Accel Deep mower deck produces a superior lawn at higher mowing speeds and is easily equipped to bag or mulch.

Name: Bluegrass Living Natural Gas Vent Free Blue Flame Gas Space Heater With Base Feet – 10,000 BTU, T-Stat Control – Model# B10TNB-B
Description:
' \n \n

Bluegrass Living specializes in luxurious indoor and outdoor heating appliances as well as supplemental heating. Our products are proudly assembled using the finest machinery right here in the USA!

\n

This Product Is Proudly Assembled in the USA Using Parts Manufactured in the USA!

\n

Designed, Engineered, Assembled and Tested in the USA.

\n \n

The Bluegrass Living ventless blue flame gas wall space heater operates on Natural Gas and gives you 10,000 Maximum BTU of reliable supplemental heat that can heat up to 500 sq. ft of living space. The space heater is perfect for not only just taking the chill out of the room but also for keeping your area warm on even the coldest winter days.

\n \n

Blue flame vent-free gas space heaters are clean burning, fuel efficient and safe to use. This gas heater works much like a central heating system in that it heats the air in the room by circulating warm comfortable air throughout the room.

\n \n

This blue flame cabinet heater is equipped with a thermostat which allows you to maintain and control the desired room temperature. The easy push-button ignition makes it simple to start while the oxygen depletion sensor features an automatic shut-off design to keep your home safe. This heater can be mounted to the wall or the floor with the included mounting brackets and hardware. No electricity is required which is perfect for keeping you warm during power outages.

\n \n

Added Value: Base Feet Included, a $20 value!

Description:
' \n \n

Bluegrass Living specializes in luxurious indoor and outdoor heating appliances as well as supplemental heating. Our products are proudly assembled using the finest machinery right here in the USA!

\n

This Product Is Proudly Assembled in the USA Using Parts Manufactured in the USA!

\n

Designed, Engineered, Assembled and Tested in the USA.

\n

Skilled American workers manufacture parts, assemble and test our products.

\n

Only high-quality materials and parts are used in the manufacturing of our products.

\n

Our factory features state-of-the-art manufacturing equipment.

\n

Product ships from our domestic warehouse in Kentucky, USA.

\n \n

The Bluegrass Living ventless blue flame gas wall space heater operates on Natural Gas and gives you 20,000 Maximum BTU of reliable supplemental heat that can heat up to 950 sq. ft of living space. The space heater is perfect for not only just taking the chill out of the room but also for keeping your area warm on even the coldest winter days.

\n \n

Blue flame vent-free gas space heaters are clean burning, fuel efficient and safe to use. This gas heater works much like a central heating system in that it heats the air in the room by circulating warm comfortable air throughout the room.

\n \n

This blue flame cabinet heater is equipped with a thermostat which allows you to maintain and control the desired room temperature. The easy push-button ignition makes it simple to start while the oxygen depletion sensor features an automatic shut-off design to keep your home safe. This heater can be mounted to the wall or the floor with the included mounting brackets and hardware. No electricity is required which is perfect for keeping you warm during power outages.

\n \n

A great additional feature, this heater includes a pre-installed blower which helps spread warm air throughout the room. The blower has two operating modes, thermostat and manual. In the thermostat setting, the blower will cycle on and off automatically as it senses heat from the heater. In the manual mode, you can choose from either on or off settings. The blower requires standard 120V household current, but if the power goes out, your heater will still operate without the blower.

\n \n

Added Value: Base Feet Included, a $50 value!

\n \n

Name: Bluegrass Living Propane Gas Vent Free Infrared Gas Space Heater With Blower and Base Feet – 28,000 BTU, T-Stat Control – Model# B28TPIR-BB
Description:
' \n \n

Bluegrass Living specializes in luxurious indoor and outdoor heating appliances as well as supplemental heating. Our products are proudly assembled using the finest machinery right here in the USA!

\n

This Product Is Proudly Assembled in the USA Using Parts Manufactured in the USA!

\n

Designed, Engineered, Assembled and Tested in the USA.

\n

Skilled American workers manufacture parts, assemble and test our products.

\n

Only high-quality materials and parts are used in the manufacturing of our products.

\n

Our factory features state of the art manufacturing equipment.

\n

Product ships from our domestic warehouse in Kentucky, USA.

\n \n

The Bluegrass Living ventless infra-red radiant gas wall space heater operates on Liquid Propane Gas and gives you 28,000 Maximum BTU of reliable supplemental heat that can heat up to 1,400 sq. ft of living space. The space heater is perfect for not only just taking the chill out of the room but also for keeping your area warm on even the coldest winter days.

\n \n

This radiant heater features the latest advancement in vent free infrared plaque burner design which uses larger plaques to provide more heat per plaque. Vent-free gas plaque space heaters are clean burning, fuel efficient and safe to use. Operating like the sun, infrared radiant heaters provide instant direct radiant heat to people or objects in the room.

\n \n

This infrared plaque cabinet heater is equipped with a thermostat which allows you to maintain and control the desired room temperature. The easy push-button ignition makes it simple to start while the oxygen depletion sensor features an automatic shut-off design to keep your home safe. This heater can be mounted to the wall or the floor with the included mounting brackets and hardware. No electricity is required which is perfect for keeping you warm during power outages.

\n \n

A great additional feature, this heater includes a pre-installed blower which helps spread warm air throughout the room. The blower has two operating modes, thermostat and manual. In the thermostat setting, the blower will cycle on and off automatically as it senses heat from the heater. In the manual mode, you can choose from either on or off settings. The blower requires standard 120V household current but if the power goes out, your heater will still operate without the blower.

\n \n

Added Value: Base Feet Included, a $50 value!

\n \n

Name: TGrip Pro Series Single Handle Bar with Solid Olympic Sleeves Training Kits – Multi Grip – Functional Training – Football – Swiss – Neutral
Description:
TGrip Single Straight Handle Bar with Solid (Non-Rotating Ends) The TGrip Single Straight Handle Bar is a revolutionary full-length Olympic barbell designed for maximum versatility and comfort during strength training. Engineered with neutral grip handles positioned parallel to each other, it is ideal for bench presses, barbell rows, and other compound exercises. This bar seamlessly fits standard Olympic bar racks, making it a must-have for home gyms, commercial gyms, and personal training setups. Unlike conventional bars, the TGrip Barbell features angled handles that create open space, enabling unique movements and exercises that traditional parallel grip bars cannot accommodate. Its ergonomic design reduces strain on the shoulders and wrists, making it perfect for athletes seeking comfort without compromising performance. The TGrip Barbell also functions as an Olympic-sized EZ-curl bar, making it an all-in-one barbell for diverse workouts.

TGrip Barbell Training Kits

To complement the TGrip Barbell’s versatility, choose from the following training kits:
  • Training Kit One: Includes the TGrip Bar and a rubber Olympic plate set of 2 each of 2.5 lb, 5 lb, and 10 lb plates.
  • Training Kit Two: Includes the TGrip Bar and a rubber Olympic plate set of 2 each of 45 lb, 25 lb, 10 lb, 5 lb, and 2.5 lb plates.
  • Training Kit Three: Includes the TGrip Bar and a rubber Olympic plate set of 2 each of 45 lb, 35 lb, 25 lb, 10 lb, 5 lb, and 2.5 lb plates.

Key Features and Specifications

  • Compatibility: Designed for use with Olympic plates (2″ center hole).
  • Solid Bar Ends: 1.90″ diameter non-rotating ends; compatible with TGrip 1.90″ Heavy Duty Spring Collars.
  • Lightweight Hollow Shaft: Perfect for beginners or progressive loading.
  • Knurled Handles: Offers a secure grip for every exercise.
  • Cambered Curl Grips: Adds versatility for biceps and triceps training.
  • Ergonomic Design: Ideal handle placement for natural movement.
  • Universal Fit: Works with all Olympic-width benches, cages, and racks.
  • Durable Construction: Weight load rating exceeds 600 lbs.

Barbell Dimensions

  • Length: 7 ft
  • Weight: 35 lbs
  • Distance Between Handles: 20 inches

Benefits of the TGrip Barbell

The TGrip Barbell is the ultimate training tool for athletes, bodybuilders, and fitness enthusiasts. Its innovative design allows for a neutral grip or multi-grip, reducing joint strain and improving workout efficiency. Escape shoulder pain while continuing to enjoy the benefits of pressing exercises like the bench press and shoulder press. Whether you’re performing powerlifting, bodybuilding, strongman training, or physical therapy, this bar offers unparalleled comfort, balance, and stability. Unlike traditional bars, the TGrip Barbell simplifies multi-grip exercises, making it a top choice for injury prevention and sport-specific training.

Why Choose the TGrip Barbell?

  • Versatility: The TGrip Barbell can replace or complement standard Olympic bars in your routine.
  • Comfort: Designed to minimize stress on joints while enhancing performance.
  • Durability: Built with high-quality materials to withstand heavy use.
  • Innovation: Its unique angled handles create a natural motion and open space for optimal movement.
  • Professional Design: Trusted by athletes and trainers for superior results.

Elevate Your Fitness Routine

Break away from traditional equipment and transform your training regimen with the TGrip Single Straight Handle Bar. Whether you’re a seasoned athlete or new to weightlifting, this bar is a game-changer for improving performance, reducing joint stress, and achieving your fitness goals.

FAQs About the TGrip Barbell

  • What exercises can I do with the TGrip Barbell? You can perform bench presses, barbell rows, shoulder presses, biceps curls, triceps extensions, and more.
  • What makes the TGrip Barbell unique? The angled handle design, ergonomic grip, and versatility for neutral grip or multi-grip exercises make it stand out.
  • What are the benefits of Training Kits? Each kit provides a complete setup for strength training with Olympic plates tailored to different fitness levels.

Important Note Regarding Registering Your Golf Cart

\nMany customers purchase golf carts to use them on the street within their communities. Please note that laws regarding street legality for slow-moving vehicles \nsuch as golf carts are regulated at the municipal level. \n \nImport Junkies cannot guarantee your ability to use the cart on the street in your area. All carts are assigned serial numbers at the factory but do not come with 17-digit \nVehicle Identification Numbers (VINs). \n \nWe will provide a Notarized Sales Receipt with the Make, Model, and Serial Number of the cart upon request. This serves as proof of ownership. \nHowever, we cannot provide Certificates of Origin, titles, or manufacturer-generated paperwork. \n \nPlease check with your local laws and regulations regarding golf cart usage before placing your order.

Name: Duluth Forge Full Size Electric Fireplace – Remote Control, Antique White Finish – Model# EL1350-2-AW
Description:
' \n \n

This Duluth Forge Electric Fireplace instantly adds warmth and elegance to any room and is quite simply a beautiful and versatile piece of quality furniture. This electric fireplace can live in an antique, modern, bohemian, industrial, minimal, or any other type of home. The fireplace has been carefully designed and created using furniture quality materials and finishes in an Antique White furniture grade finish that accents its quality and excellence.

\n \n

The electric fireplace insert features a large glowing ember bed, molded logs, adjustable background lights and is also operable independent of the heat for true year-round enjoyment. The electric fireplace insert has a digital read out with manual controls as well as a remote control to ensure the best performance. Using the remote control you have everything you need to create a cozy atmosphere at your fingertips. The included remote allows you to turn the unit on/off, adjust the thermostat temperature, set the timer, control the flames, adjust the background lights and more!

\n \n

Name: Duluth Forge Full Size Electric Fireplace – Remote Control, Apple Spice Finish – Model# EL1350-4-AS
Description:
' \n \n

This Duluth Forge Electric Fireplace instantly adds warmth and elegance to any room and is quite simply a beautiful and versatile piece of quality furniture. This electric fireplace can live in an antique, modern, bohemian, industrial, minimal, or any other type of home. The fireplace has been carefully designed and created using furniture quality materials and finishes that accents its quality and excellence.

\n \n

The electric fireplace insert features a large glowing ember bed, molded logs, adjustable background lights and is also operable independent of the heat for true year-round enjoyment. The electric fireplace insert has a digital read out with manual controls as well as a remote control to ensure the best performance. Using the remote control, you have everything you need to create a cozy atmosphere at your fingertips. The included remote allows you to turn the unit on/off, adjust the thermostat temperature, set the timer, control the flames, adjust the background lights and more!

Name: 14×12 Hawthorne Traditional Steel Pergola With Sail Shade Soft Canopy
Description: Step into the future of patio decor with our Hawthorne steel pergola. Impeccably styled in a modern white finish, this structure combines the traditional charm of pergolas with the robustness of galvanized steel. \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven \nto withstand winds up to 100 mph*. Decked out with a chic sail shade canopy and a handy PowerPort™ that boasts 3 USB and 3 electrical outlets, this pergola ensures style meets substance.

Name: 14×12 Beaumont Pergola
Description: Sometimes, you’ve got to go big — and that’s when our Beaumont pergola shines. Aesthetically appealing from top to bottom and \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven \nto withstand winds up to 100 mph*, this cedar wood pergola is both visually striking and verified strong. \n \nThe Beaumont also comes equipped with our exclusive PowerPort™, housing 3 electrical outlets and 3 USB ports for maximum convenience. Blend elegance with utility by inviting the Beaumont pergola into your backyard — a grand impression is guaranteed!

Name: 14×12 Ashford Traditional Steel Pergola With Sail Shade Soft Canopy
Description: Our Ashford steel pergola is an exquisite fusion of tradition and durability wrapped up in a rustic brown finish. Maintaining a timeless aesthetic, it pairs a meticulously designed framework with a light-filtering sail shade canopy you’ll enjoy year-round. \n \nThis powder-coated galvanized-steel structure guarantees maintenance-free reliability and is \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven \nto withstand winds up to 100 mph*. Plus, each one includes our exclusive PowerPort™ for lighting and electronics so that you get a classic look, refined for the modern backyard.

Name: 14×10 Windham Modern Steel Pergola With Sail Shade Soft Canopy
Description: One glance at our Windham steel pergola and you’ll notice its style. One touch of its sturdy galvanized steel-structure and you’ll immediately understand its strength. \n \nWith a modern design and sleek, contemporary white finish — plus year-round durability — it’s a showstopper that literally stands apart. Powder coated for maintenance-free longevity, \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven \nto withstand winds up to 100 mph*, and backed by a 5 year limited warranty, it’s the height of durable elegance in outdoor living!

Name: 14×10 Stratford Traditional Steel Pergola With Sail Shade Soft Canopy
Description: Step up your outdoor space with our Stratford steel pergola. Combining classic style with modern resilience, this sophisticated pergola, finished in sleek black, is built from super-strong, rust-resistant galvanized steel. Plus it’s \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven \nready to resist winds up to 100 mph*. \n \nOffering an ample amount of shade, it’s perfect for all your social gatherings. The light-filtering soft canopy adds a touch of elegance while our exclusive PowerPort™ keeps your lights, music, and gadgets powered. With a solid 5-year warranty, it’s not just beautiful, it’s built to last!

Name: 14×10 Somerville Pergola – Barnwood Stain
Description: Enliven your backyard with our Somerville 14×10 pergola. Not only does it capture the eye with its stylish design, it also stands strong against the elements, \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven, \nready to resist winds up to 100 mph*. \n \nOutfitted with our exclusive PowerPort™, you can easily create a snug outdoor spot for family and friends. Give it your personal touch with twinkling lights, climbing blossoms, or a cozy seating arrangement. The possibilities are endless!

Name: 14×10 Somerville Pergola – Barnwood Stain
Description: Enliven your backyard with our Somerville 14×10 pergola. Not only does it capture the eye with its stylish design, it also stands strong against the elements, \n \nPRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven, \nready to resist winds up to 100 mph*. \n \nOutfitted with our exclusive PowerPort™, you can easily create a snug outdoor spot for family and friends. Give it your personal touch with twinkling lights, climbing blossoms, or a cozy seating arrangement. The possibilities are endless!

Name: 14×10 Sarasota Steel Louvered Pergola
Description:
Our Sarasota Louvered Pergola is a modern steel pergola that gives you the ability to easily open the louvers to let the sun through or close them to provide shade and protection from the weather.
\n
\nThe transformation is quick and simple and when it’s fully closed, the built-in drainage system directs water through the integrated downspouts in leg posts. Adaptable, designed to impress, and built to last, our Sarasota Louvered Pergola gives you multiple ways to enjoy your backyard.

Name: 14×10 Delray Pergola
Description:
' \n \n

Expand your horizon of comfort with this 14×10 pergola. Fusing our reliable outdoor shade structures with unique advantages in spaciousness and sun protection, our Delray pergola stands apart.

\n \n

It provides ample flexibility for any outdoor setting with a wide canopy and a greater number of purlins for more shade. Plus, our exclusive PowerPort™ lets you transform it into the ultimate hub for cozy outdoor gatherings. And to top it off, it’s PRO-TECT™ Tested and Proven to withstand winds up to 100 mph*.

\n

Name: Arlington 12′ X 12′ Solid Wood Patio Gazebo
Description:
Transform your ordinary outdoor living space with Backyard Discovery’s grand Arlington Gazebo. Made from 100% Cedar wood, the Arlington is naturally resistant to rot and decay while also being a Pro-Tect-certified performance structure. Pro-Tect testing certifies the Arlington to withstand up to 7,886 pounds of weight along with a wind certification of up to 100 mph.
\n
\nAnother Pro-Tect feature of the Arlington Gazebo is the insulated steel roof that reduces thermal heat transfer by up to 20 degrees, ensuring comfort in any region. Completing the Arlington is Backyard Discovery’s exclusive PowerPort™ featuring 3 electrical outlets and 3 USB ports for charging devices, lights, and more.
\n
\nYou can be confident the tenacious Arlington Gazebo by Backyard Discovery will make an exquisite addition to any outdoor area!

Name: Ridstar E26 PRO Electric Bike 48V 23Ah Battery 1000W*2 Dual Motors 26*4.0inches Tires 50-75KM Max Mileage 15
Description:
Ridstar E26 PRO Electric Bike 48V 23Ah Battery 1000W*2 Dual Motors 26*4.0inches Tires 50-75KM Max Mileage 15 \n \n  \n \nThe Ridstar E26 Pro is designed for those who demand power, endurance, and versatility in an electric bike. Whether you’re commuting through city streets, taking on rugged trails, or cruising through open landscapes, this high-performance e-bike delivers an exceptional riding experience with top-tier engineering and cutting-edge technology. \n

Powerful 2000W Motor – Ride with Confidence

\nAt the heart of the Ridstar E26 Pro is its 2000W brushless motor, providing immense torque and acceleration. This powerhouse motor delivers: \nHigh-speed performance for exhilarating rides. \nEffortless hill climbing – conquer inclines with ease. \nSeamless power output – whether you’re riding on pavement, dirt roads, or trails. \n \nWith a top speed that rivals traditional motorbikes, the Ridstar E26 Pro ensures that every ride is as thrilling as it is efficient. \n

Long-Lasting 48V 23Ah Lithium Battery – Go Further on a Single Charge

\nDesigned for extended rides, this e-bike comes equipped with a high-capacity 48V 23Ah lithium battery, allowing you to travel longer distances without frequent recharging. \n \nExtended range – ideal for daily commutes and long-distance adventures. \nFast charging capability – so you can get back on the road quickly. \nReliable power output – ensuring a smooth and consistent riding experience. \n \nOn a full charge, you can explore the outdoors, commute to work, or take on challenging terrains without worrying about running out of battery. \n

Advanced Riding Comfort & Stability

\nBuilt for versatility and comfort, the Ridstar E26 Pro is designed with 26-inch fat tires that provide superior grip and traction across all types of terrain, including sand, snow, gravel, and asphalt. \n \nAll-Terrain Fat Tires: Extra-wide tires ensure stability and control, reducing vibrations and providing a smoother ride. \nFull Suspension System: Equipped with both front and rear suspension, this e-bike absorbs shocks and bumps effortlessly, making off-road rides more comfortable. \nErgonomic Design: A well-padded seat, adjustable handlebars, and a sturdy frame offer a balanced and fatigue-free riding experience, even on long journeys. \n

Smart Technology & Safety Features

\nThe Ridstar E26 Pro is designed with the latest e-bike technology to enhance convenience, safety, and control. \n \nMulti-Function LCD Display: Stay informed with real-time speed, battery level, trip distance, and more. \nHydraulic Disc Brakes: Advanced braking technology ensures quick and responsive stopping power, providing maximum control and safety. \nIntegrated LED Headlight & Taillight: Ride with confidence at night with bright illumination that enhances visibility and keeps you safe on the road. \n \nWhether you’re riding through city traffic, exploring trails, or cruising through town, the Ridstar E26 Pro keeps you in control at all times. \n

Perfect for Every Rider – Commuters, Adventurers & More

\nNo matter your riding style or purpose, the Ridstar E26 Pro adapts to your needs: \n✔ City Commuting: Avoid traffic, save on fuel costs, and ride efficiently with powerful speed and endurance. \n✔ Off-Road Exploration: Take on rugged terrains with confidence, thanks to the fat tires and robust suspension system. \n✔ Recreational Riding: Enjoy long scenic rides with an ultra-smooth and comfortable experience. \n

Why Choose the Ridstar E26 Pro?

\n✔ Powerful 2000W motor for high-speed performance. \n✔ Long-range 48V 23Ah battery for extended rides. \n✔ Full suspension & fat tires for superior comfort and stability. \n✔ Smart LCD display & hydraulic disc brakes for enhanced safety and control. \n✔ Sleek, durable, and stylish design for riders who value both aesthetics and performance. \n

Upgrade Your Ride Today!

\nExperience the freedom, power, and performance of the Ridstar E26 Pro Electric Bike. Whether you’re an urban commuter, a weekend explorer, or a thrill-seeker, this e-bike is engineered to elevate your riding experience like never before. \n \n🚴 Order yours today and redefine the way you ride! \n \n
